  1397. 1397              * --- --- --- --- --- --- --- --- --- --- --- --- --- --- --- --- ---
  1398. 1398              * Private Functions
  1399. 1399              * --- --- --- --- --- --- --- --- --- --- --- --- --- --- --- --- ---
  1400. 1400              */
  1401. 1401 
  1402. 1402             private function propagateTurnOff() {
  1403. 1403                 if ( $this->lastGlobalErrorHandler !== null ) {
  1404. 1404                     $this->lastGlobalErrorHandler->turnOff();
  1405. 1405                     $this->lastGlobalErrorHandler->propagateTurnOff();
  1406. 1406                     $this->lastGlobalErrorHandler = null;
  1407. 1407                 }
  1408. 1408             }
  1409. 1409             
  1410. 1410             /**
  1411. 1411              * This is intended to be used closely with 'onShutdown'.
  1412. 1412              * It ensures that output buffering is turned on.
  1413. 1413              * 
  1414. 1414              * Why? The user may output content, and *then* hit an error.
  1415. 1415              * We cannot replace the page if this happens,
  1416. 1416              * because they have already outputted information.
  1417. 1417              * 
  1418. 1418              * So we buffer the page, and then output at the end of the page,
  1419. 1419              * or when an error strikes.
  1420. 1420              */
  1421. 1421             private function startBuffer() {
  1422. 1422                 global $_php_error_is_ini_enabled;
  1423. 1423                 
  1424. 1424                 if ( $_php_error_is_ini_enabled && !$this->isBufferSetup ) {
  1425. 1425                     $this->isBufferSetup = true;
  1426. 1426 
  1427. 1427                     ini_set( 'implicit_flush', false );
  1428. 1428                     ob_implicit_flush( false );
  1429. 1429 
  1430. 1430                     if ( ! @ini_get('output_buffering') ) {
  1431. 1431                         @ini_set( 'output_buffering', 'on' );
  1432. 1432                     }
  1433. 1433 
  1434. 1434                     $output = '';
  1435. 1435                     $bufferOutput = true;
  1436. 1436 
  1437. 1437                     $this->bufferOutputStr  = &$output;
  1438. 1438                     $this->bufferOutput = &$bufferOutput;
  1439. 1439 
  1440. 1440                     ob_start( function($string) use (&$output, &$bufferOutput) {
  1441. 1441                         if ( $bufferOutput ) {
  1442. 1442                             $output .= $string;
  1443. 1443                             return '';
  1444. 1444                         } else {
  1445. 1445                             $temp = $output . $string;
  1446. 1446                             $output = '';
  1447. 1447                             return $temp;
  1448. 1448                         }
  1449. 1449                     });
  1450. 1450 
  1451. 1451                     $self = $this;
  1452. 1452                     register_shutdown_function( function() use ( $self ) {
  1453. 1453                         $self->__onShutdown();
  1454. 1454                     });
  1455. 1455                 }
  1456. 1456             }
  1457. 1457 
  1458. 1458             /**
  1459. 1459              * Turns off buffering, and discards anything buffered
  1460. 1460              * so far.
  1461. 1461              * 
  1462. 1462              * This will return what has been buffered incase you
  1463. 1463              * do want it. However otherwise, it will be lost.
  1464. 1464              */
  1465. 1465             private function discardBuffer() {
  1466. 1466                 $str = $this->bufferOutputStr;
  1467. 1467 
  1468. 1468                 $this->bufferOutputStr = '';
  1469. 1469                 $this->bufferOutput = false;
  1470. 1470 
  1471. 1471                 return $str;
  1472. 1472             }
  1473. 1473 
  1474. 1474             /**
  1475. 1475              * Flushes the internal buffer,
  1476. 1476              * outputting what is left.
  1477. 1477              * 
  1478. 1478              * @param append Optional, extra content to append onto the output buffer.
  1479. 1479              */
  1480. 1480             private function flushBuffer() {
  1481. 1481                 $temp = $this->bufferOutputStr;
  1482. 1482                 $this->bufferOutputStr = '';
  1483. 1483 
  1484. 1484                 return $temp;
  1485. 1485             }
  1486. 1486 
  1487. 1487             /**
  1488. 1488              * This will finish buffering, and output the page.
  1489. 1489              * It also appends the magic JS onto the beginning of the page,
  1490. 1490              * if enabled, to allow working with Ajax.
  1491. 1491              * 
  1492. 1492              * Note that if PHP Error has been disabled in the php.ini file,
  1493. 1493              * or through some other option, such as running from the command line,
  1494. 1494              * then this will do nothing (as no buffering will take place).
  1495. 1495              */
  1496. 1496             public function endBuffer() {
  1497. 1497                 if ( $this->isBufferSetup ) {
  1498. 1498                     if ( 
  1499. 1499                             !$this->isAjax &&
  1500. 1500                              $this->catchAjaxErrors &&
  1501. 1501                             (!$this->htmlOnly || !ErrorHandler::isNonPHPRequest())
  1502. 1502                     ) {
  1503. 1503                         $content  = ob_get_contents();
  1504. 1504                         $handlers = ob_list_handlers();
  1505. 1505 
  1506. 1506                         $wasGZHandler = false;
  1507. 1507 
  1508. 1508                         $this->bufferOutput = true;
  1509. 1509                         for ( $i = count($handlers)-1; $i >= 0; $i-- ) {
  1510. 1510                             $handler = $handlers[$i];
  1511. 1511 
  1512. 1512                             if ( $handler === 'ob_gzhandler' ) {
  1513. 1513                                 $wasGZHandler = true;
  1514. 1514                                 ob_end_clean();
  1515. 1515                             } else if ( $handler === 'default output handler' ) {
  1516. 1516                                 ob_end_clean();
  1517. 1517                             } else {
  1518. 1518                                 ob_end_flush();
  1519. 1519                             }
  1520. 1520                         }
  1521. 1521 
  1522. 1522                         $content = $this->discardBuffer();
  1523. 1523 
  1524. 1524                         if ( $wasGZHandler ) {
  1525. 1525                             ob_start('ob_gzhandler');
  1526. 1526                         } else {
  1527. 1527                             ob_start();
  1528. 1528                         }
  1529. 1529            
  1530. 1530                         $js = $this->getContent( 'displayJSInjection' );
  1531. 1531                         $js = JSMin::minify( $js );
  1532. 1532 
  1533. 1533                         // attemp to inject the script into the HTML, after the doctype
  1534. 1534                         $matches = array();
  1535. 1535                         preg_match( ErrorHandler::REGEX_DOCTYPE, $content, $matches );
  1536. 1536 
  1537. 1537                         if ( $matches ) {
  1538. 1538                             $doctype = $matches[0];
  1539. 1539                             $content = preg_replace( ErrorHandler::REGEX_DOCTYPE, "$doctype $js", $content );
  1540. 1540                         } else {
  1541. 1541                             echo $js;
  1542. 1542                         }
  1543. 1543           
  1544. 1544                         echo $content;
  1545. 1545                     }
  1546. 1546                 }
  1547. 1547             }
  1548. 1548 
  1549. 1549             /**
  1550. 1550              * Calls the given method on this object,
  1551. 1551              * captures it's output, and then returns it.
  1552. 1552              * 
  1553. 1553              * @param method The name of the method to call.
  1554. 1554              * @return All of the text outputted during the method call.
  1555. 1555              */
  1556. 1556             private function getContent( $method ) {
  1557. 1557                 ob_start();
  1558. 1558                 $this->$method();
  1559. 1559                 $content = ob_get_contents();
  1560. 1560                 ob_end_clean();
  1561. 1561 
  1562. 1562                 return $content;
  1563. 1563             }
  1564. 1564 
  1565. 1565             private function isApplicationFolder( $file ) {
  1566. 1566                 return ErrorHandler::isFolderType(
  1567. 1567                         $this->applicationFolders,
  1568. 1568                         $this->applicationFoldersLongest,
  1569. 1569                         $file
  1570. 1570                 );
  1571. 1571             }
  1572. 1572 
  1573. 1573             private function isIgnoreFolder( $file ) {
  1574. 1574                 return ErrorHandler::isFolderType(
  1575. 1575                         $this->ignoreFolders,
  1576. 1576                         $this->ignoreFoldersLongest,
  1577. 1577                         $file
  1578. 1578                 );
  1579. 1579             }
  1580. 1580 
  1581. 1581             private function getFolderType( $root, $file ) {
  1582. 1582                 $testFile = $this->removeRootPath( $root, $file );
  1583. 1583 
  1584. 1584                 // it's this file : (
  1585. 1585                 if ( $file === __FILE__ ) {
  1586. 1586                     $type = ErrorHandler::FILE_TYPE_IGNORE;
  1587. 1587                 } else if ( strpos($testFile, '/') === false ) {
  1588. 1588                     $type = ErrorHandler::FILE_TYPE_ROOT;
  1589. 1589                 } else if ( $this->isApplicationFolder($testFile) ) {
  1590. 1590                     $type = ErrorHandler::FILE_TYPE_APPLICATION;
  1591. 1591                 } else if ( $this->isIgnoreFolder($testFile) ) {
  1592. 1592                     $type = ErrorHandler::FILE_TYPE_IGNORE;
  1593. 1593                 } else {
  1594. 1594                     $type = false;
  1595. 1595                 }
  1596. 1596 
  1597. 1597                 return array( $type, $testFile );
  1598. 1598             }
  1599. 1599 
  1600. 1600             /**
  1601. 1601              * Finds the file named, and returns it's contents in an array.
  1602. 1602              * 
  1603. 1603              * It's essentially the same as 'file_get_contents'. However
  1604. 1604              * this will add caching at this PHP layer, avoiding lots of
  1605. 1605              * duplicate calls.
  1606. 1606              * 
  1607. 1607              * It also splits the file into an array of lines, and makes
  1608. 1608              * it html safe.
  1609. 1609              * 
  1610. 1610              * @param path The file to get the contents of.
  1611. 1611              * @return The file we are after, as an array of lines.
  1612. 1612              */
  1613. 1613             private function getFileContents( $path ) {
  1614. 1614                 if ( isset($this->cachedFiles[$path]) ) {
  1615. 1615                     return $this->cachedFiles[$path];
  1616. 1616                 } else {
  1617. 1617                     $contents = @file_get_contents( $path );
  1618. 1618 
  1619. 1619                     if ( $contents ) {
  1620. 1620                         $contents = explode(
  1621. 1621                                 "\n",
  1622. 1622                                 preg_replace(
  1623. 1623                                         '/(\r\n)|(\n\r)|\r/',
  1624. 1624                                         "\n",
  1625. 1625                                         str_replace( "\t", '    ', $contents )
  1626. 1626                                 )
  1627. 1627                         );
  1628. 1628 
  1629. 1629                         $this->cachedFiles[ $path ] = $contents;
  1630. 1630 
  1631. 1631                         return $contents;
  1632. 1632                     }
  1633. 1633                 }
  1634. 1634 
  1635. 1635                 return array();
  1636. 1636             }
  1637. 1637 
  1638. 1638             /**
  1639. 1639              * Reads out the code from the section of the line,
  1640. 1640              * which is at fault.
  1641. 1641              * 
  1642. 1642              * The array is in a mapping of: array( line-number => line )
  1643. 1643              * 
  1644. 1644              * If something goes wrong, then null is returned.
  1645. 1645              */
  1646. 1646             private function readCodeFile( $errFile, $errLine ) {
  1647. 1647                 try {
  1648. 1648                     $lines = $this->getFileContents( $errFile );
  1649. 1649 
  1650. 1650                     if ( $lines ) {
  1651. 1651                         $numLines = $this->numLines;
  1652. 1652 
  1653. 1653                         $searchUp   = ceil( $numLines*0.75 );
  1654. 1654                         $searchDown = $numLines - $searchUp;
  1655. 1655                         
  1656. 1656                         $countLines = count( $lines );
  1657. 1657 
  1658. 1658                         /*
  1659. 1659                          * Search around the errLine.
  1660. 1660                          * We should aim get half of the lines above, and half from below.
  1661. 1661                          * If that fails we get as many as we can.
  1662. 1662                          */
  1663. 1663 
  1664. 1664                         /*
  1665. 1665                          * If we are near the bottom edge,
  1666. 1666                          * we go down as far as we can,
  1667. 1667                          * then work up the search area.
  1668. 1668                          */
  1669. 1669                         if ( $errLine+$searchDown > $countLines ) {
  1670. 1670                             $minLine = max( 0, $countLines-$numLines );
  1671. 1671                             $maxLine = $countLines;
  1672. 1672                         /*
  1673. 1673                          * Go up as far as we can, up to half the search area.
  1674. 1674                          * Then stretch down the whole search area.
  1675. 1675                          */
  1676. 1676                         } else {
  1677. 1677                             $minLine = max( 0, $errLine-$searchUp );
  1678. 1678                             $maxLine = min( $minLine+$numLines, count($lines) );
  1679. 1679                         }
  1680. 1680 
  1681. 1681                         $fileLines = array_splice( $lines, $minLine, $maxLine-$minLine );
  1682. 1682 
  1683. 1683                         $stripSize = -1;
  1684. 1684                         foreach ( $fileLines as $i => $line ) {
  1685. 1685                             $newLine = ltrim( $line, ' ' );
  1686. 1686 
  1687. 1687                             if ( strlen($newLine) > 0 ) {
  1688. 1688                                 $numSpaces = strlen($line) - strlen($newLine);
  1689. 1689 
  1690. 1690                                 if ( $stripSize === -1 ) {
  1691. 1691                                     $stripSize = $numSpaces;
  1692. 1692                                 } else {
  1693. 1693                                     $stripSize = min( $stripSize, $numSpaces );
  1694. 1694                                 }
  1695. 1695                             } else {
  1696. 1696                                 $fileLines[$i] = $newLine;
  1697. 1697                             }
  1698. 1698                         }
  1699. 1699                         if ( $stripSize > 0 ) {
  1700. 1700                             /*
  1701. 1701                              * It's pretty common that PHP code is not flush with the left hand edge,
  1702. 1702                              * so subtract 4 spaces, if we can,
  1703. 1703                              * to account for this.
  1704. 1704                              */
  1705. 1705                             if ( $stripSize > 4 ) {
  1706. 1706                                 $stripSize -= 4;
  1707. 1707                             }
  1708. 1708 
  1709. 1709                             foreach ( $fileLines as $i => $line ) {
  1710. 1710                                 if ( strlen($line) > $stripSize ) {
  1711. 1711                                     $fileLines[$i] = substr( $line, $stripSize );
  1712. 1712                                 }
  1713. 1713                             }
  1714. 1714                         }
  1715. 1715 
  1716. 1716                         $fileLines = join( "\n", $fileLines );
  1717. 1717                         $fileLines = ErrorHandler::syntaxHighlight( $fileLines );
  1718. 1718                         $fileLines = explode( "\n", $fileLines );
  1719. 1719 
  1720. 1720                         $lines = array();
  1721. 1721                         for ( $i = 0; $i < count($fileLines); $i++ ) {
  1722. 1722                             // +1 is because line numbers start at 1, whilst arrays start at 0
  1723. 1723                             $lines[ $i+$minLine+1 ] = $fileLines[$i];
  1724. 1724                         }
  1725. 1725                     }
  1726. 1726 
  1727. 1727                     return $lines;
  1728. 1728                 } catch ( Exception $ex ) {
  1729. 1729                     return null;
  1730. 1730                 }
  1731. 1731 
  1732. 1732                 return null;
  1733. 1733             }
  1734. 1734 
  1735. 1735             /**
  1736. 1736              * Attempts to remove the root path from the path given.
  1737. 1737              * If the path can't be removed, then the original path is returned.
  1738. 1738              * 
  1739. 1739              * For example if root is 'C:/users/projects/my_site',
  1740. 1740              * and the file is 'C:/users/projects/my_site/index.php',
  1741. 1741              * then the root is removed, and we are left with just 'index.php'.
  1742. 1742              * 
  1743. 1743              * This is to remove line noise; you don't need to be told the
  1744. 1744              * 'C:/whatever' bit 20 times.
  1745. 1745              * 
  1746. 1746              * @param root The root path to remove.
  1747. 1747              * @param path The file we are removing the root section from.
  1748. 1748              */
  1749. 1749             private function removeRootPath( $root, $path ) {
  1750. 1750                 $filePath = str_replace( '\\', '/', $path );
  1751. 1751 
  1752. 1752                 if (
  1753. 1753                         strpos($filePath, $root) === 0 &&
  1754. 1754                         strlen($root) < strlen($filePath)
  1755. 1755                 ) {
  1756. 1756                     return substr($filePath, strlen($root)+1 );
  1757. 1757                 } else {
  1758. 1758                     return $filePath;
  1759. 1759                 }
  1760. 1760             }
  1761. 1761 
  1762. 1762             /**
  1763. 1763              * Parses, and alters, the errLine, errFile and message given.
  1764. 1764              * 
  1765. 1765              * This includes adding syntax highlighting, removing duplicate
  1766. 1766              * information we already have, and making the error easier to
  1767. 1767              * read.
  1768. 1768              */
  1769. 1769             private function improveErrorMessage( $ex, $code, $message, $errLine, $errFile, $root, &$stackTrace ) {
  1770. 1770                 // change these to change where the source file is come from
  1771. 1771                 $srcErrFile = $errFile;
  1772. 1772                 $srcErrLine = $errLine;
  1773. 1773                 $altInfo = null;
  1774. 1774                 $stackSearchI = 0;
  1775. 1775 
  1776. 1776                 $skipStackFirst = function( &$stackTrace ) {
  1777. 1777                     $skipFirst = true;
  1778. 1778 
  1779. 1779                     foreach ( $stackTrace as $i => $trace ) {
  1780. 1780                          if ( $skipFirst ) {
  1781. 1781                               $skipFirst = false;
  1782. 1782                          } else {
  1783. 1783                               if ( $trace && isset($trace['file']) && isset($trace['line']) ) {
  1784. 1784                                    return array( $trace['file'], $trace['line'], $i );
  1785. 1785                               }
  1786. 1786                         }
  1787. 1787                     }
  1788. 1788 
  1789. 1789                     return array( null, null, null );
  1790. 1790                 };
  1791. 1791 
  1792. 1792                 /*
  1793. 1793                  * This is for calling a function that doesn't exist.
  1794. 1794                  * 
  1795. 1795                  * The message contains a long description of where this takes
  1796. 1796                  * place, even though we are already told this through line and
  1797. 1797                  * file info. So we cut it out.
  1798. 1798                  */
  1799. 1799                 if ( $code === 1 ) {
  1800. 1800                     if (
  1801. 1801                             ( strpos($message, " undefined method ") !== false ) ||
  1802. 1802                             ( strpos($message, " undefined function ") !== false )
  1803. 1803                     ) {
  1804. 1804                         $matches = array();
  1805. 1805                         preg_match( '/\b[a-zA-Z_\x7f-\xff][a-zA-Z0-9_\x7f-\xff]*((->|::)[a-zA-Z_\x7f-\xff][a-zA-Z0-9_\x7f-\xff]*)?\\(\\)$/', $message, $matches );
  1806. 1806 
  1807. 1807                         /*
  1808. 1808                          * undefined function or method call
  1809. 1809                          */
  1810. 1810                         if ( $matches ) {
  1811. 1811                             list( $className, $type, $functionName ) = ErrorHandler::splitFunction( $matches[0] );
  1812. 1812 
  1813. 1813                             if ( $stackTrace && isset($stackTrace[1]) && $stackTrace[1]['args'] ) {
  1814. 1814                                 $numArgs = count( $stackTrace[1]['args'] );
  1815. 1815 
  1816. 1816                                 for ( $i = 0; $i < $numArgs; $i++ ) {
  1817. 1817                                     $args[]= ErrorHandler::newArgument( "_" );
  1818. 1818                                 }
  1819. 1819                             }
  1820. 1820 
  1821. 1821                             $message = preg_replace(
  1822. 1822                                     '/\b[a-zA-Z_\x7f-\xff][a-zA-Z0-9_\x7f-\xff]*((->|::)[a-zA-Z_\x7f-\xff][a-zA-Z0-9_\x7f-\xff]*)?\\(\\)$/',
  1823. 1823                                     ErrorHandler::syntaxHighlightFunction( $className, $type, $functionName, $args ),
  1824. 1824                                     $message
  1825. 1825                             );
  1826. 1826                         }
  1827. 1827                     } else if ( $message === 'Using $this when not in object context' ) {
  1828. 1828                         $message = 'Using <span class="syntax-variable">$this</span> outside object context';
  1829. 1829                     /*
  1830. 1830                      * Class not found error.
  1831. 1831                      */
  1832. 1832                     } else if (
  1833. 1833                         strpos($message, "Class ") !== false &&
  1834. 1834                         strpos($message, "not found") !== false
  1835. 1835                     ) {
  1836. 1836                         $matches = array();
  1837. 1837                         preg_match( '/\'(\\\\)?[a-zA-Z_\x7f-\xff][a-zA-Z0-9_\x7f-\xff]*((\\\\)?[a-zA-Z_\x7f-\xff][a-zA-Z0-9_\x7f-\xff]*)+\'/', $message, $matches );
  1838. 1838 
  1839. 1839                         if ( count($matches) > 0 ) {
  1840. 1840                             // lose the 'quotes'
  1841. 1841                             $className = $matches[0];
  1842. 1842                             $className = substr( $className, 1, strlen($className)-2 );
  1843. 1843 
  1844. 1844                             $message = preg_replace(
  1845. 1845                                     '/\'(\\\\)?[a-zA-Z_\x7f-\xff][a-zA-Z0-9_\x7f-\xff]*((\\\\)?[a-zA-Z_\x7f-\xff][a-zA-Z0-9_\x7f-\xff]*)+\'/',
  1846. 1846                                     "<span class='syntax-class'>$className</span>",
  1847. 1847                                     $message
  1848. 1848                             );
  1849. 1849                         }
  1850. 1850                     }
  1851. 1851                 } else if ( $code === 2 ) {
  1852. 1852                     if ( strpos($message, "Missing argument ") === 0 ) {
  1853. 1853                         $message = preg_replace( '/, called in .*$/', '', $message );
  1854. 1854 
  1855. 1855                         $matches = array();
  1856. 1856                         preg_match( ErrorHandler::REGEX_METHOD_OR_FUNCTION_END, $message, $matches );
  1857. 1857 
  1858. 1858                         if ( $matches ) {
  1859. 1859                             $argumentMathces = array();
  1860. 1860                             preg_match( '/^Missing argument ([0-9]+)/', $message, $argumentMathces );
  1861. 1861                             $highlightArg = count($argumentMathces) === 2 ?
  1862. 1862                                     (((int) $argumentMathces[1])-1) :
  1863. 1863                                     null ;
  1864. 1864 
  1865. 1865                             $numHighlighted = 0;
  1866. 1866                             $altInfo = ErrorHandler::syntaxHighlightFunctionMatch( $matches[0], $stackTrace, $highlightArg, $numHighlighted );
  1867. 1867 
  1868. 1868                             if ( $numHighlighted > 0 ) {
  1869. 1869                                 $message = preg_replace( '/^Missing argument ([0-9]+)/', 'Missing arguments ', $message );
  1870. 1870                             }
  1871. 1871 
  1872. 1872                             if ( $altInfo ) {
  1873. 1873                                 $message = preg_replace( ErrorHandler::REGEX_METHOD_OR_FUNCTION_END, $altInfo, $message );
  1874. 1874 
  1875. 1875                                 list( $srcErrFile, $srcErrLine, $stackSearchI ) = $skipStackFirst( $stackTrace );
  1876. 1876                             }
  1877. 1877                         }
  1878. 1878                     } else if (
  1879. 1879                             strpos($message, 'require(') === 0 ||
  1880. 1880                             strpos($message, 'include(') === 0
  1881. 1881                     ) {
  1882. 1882                         $endI  = strpos( $message, '):' );
  1883. 1883 
  1884. 1884                         if ( $endI ) {
  1885. 1885                             // include( is the same length
  1886. 1886                             $requireLen = strlen('require(');
  1887. 1887 
  1888. 1888                             /*
  1889. 1889                              * +2 to include the ): at the end of the string
  1890. 1890                              */
  1891. 1891                             $postMessage = substr( $message, $endI+2 );
  1892. 1892                             $postMessage = str_replace( 'failed to open stream: No ', 'no ', $postMessage );
  1893. 1893                             $message = substr_replace( $message, $postMessage, $endI+2 );
  1894. 1894 
  1895. 1895                             /*
  1896. 1896                              * If this string is in there, and where we think it should be,
  1897. 1897                              * swap it with a shorter message.
  1898. 1898                              */
  1899. 1899                             $replaceBit = 'failed to open stream: No ';
  1900. 1900                             if ( strpos($message, $replaceBit) === $endI+2 ) {
  1901. 1901                                 $message  = substr_replace( $message, 'no ', $endI+2, strlen($replaceBit) );
  1902. 1902                             }
  1903. 1903 
  1904. 1904                             /*
  1905. 1905                              * Now put the string highlighting in there.
  1906. 1906                              */
  1907. 1907                             $match = substr( $message, $requireLen, $endI-$requireLen );
  1908. 1908                             $newString = "<span class='syntax-string'>'$match'</span>),";
  1909. 1909                             $message  = substr_replace( $message, $newString, $requireLen, ($endI-$requireLen)+2 );
  1910. 1910                         }
  1911. 1911                     }
  1912. 1912                 /*
  1913. 1913                  * Unexpected symbol errors.
  1914. 1914                  * For example 'unexpected T_OBJECT_OPERATOR'.
  1915. 1915                  * 
  1916. 1916                  * This swaps the 'T_WHATEVER' for the symbolic representation.
  1917. 1917                  */
  1918. 1918                 } else if ( $code === 4 ) {
  1919. 1919                     if ( $message === "syntax error, unexpected T_ENCAPSED_AND_WHITESPACE" ) {
  1920. 1920                         $message = "syntax error, string is not closed";
  1921. 1921                     } else {
  1922. 1922                         $semiColonError = false;
  1923. 1923                         if ( strpos($message, 'syntax error,') === 0 && $errLine > 2 ) {
  1924. 1924                             $lines = ErrorHandler::getFileContents( $errFile );
  1925. 1925                             
  1926. 1926                             $line = $lines[$errLine-1];
  1927. 1927                             if ( preg_match( ErrorHandler::REGEX_MISSING_SEMI_COLON_FOLLOWING_LINE, $line ) !== 0 ) {
  1928. 1928                                 $content = rtrim( join( "\n", array_slice($lines, 0, $errLine-1) ) );
  1929. 1929 
  1930. 1930                                 if ( strrpos($content, ';') !== strlen($content)-1 ) {
  1931. 1931                                     $message = "Missing semi-colon";
  1932. 1932                                     $errLine--;
  1933. 1933                                     $srcErrLine = $errLine;
  1934. 1934                                     $semiColonError = true;
  1935. 1935                                 }
  1936. 1936                             }
  1937. 1937                         }
  1938. 1938 
  1939. 1939                         if ( $semiColonError ) {
  1940. 1940                             $matches = array();
  1941. 1941                             $num = preg_match( '/\bunexpected ([A-Z_]+|\\$end)\b/', $message, $matches );
  1942. 1942 
  1943. 1943                             if ( $num > 0 ) {
  1944. 1944                                 $match = $matches[0];
  1945. 1945                                 $newSymbol = ErrorHandler::phpSymbolToDescription( str_replace('unexpected ', '', $match) );
  1946. 1946 
  1947. 1947                                 $message = str_replace( $match, "unexpected $newSymbol", $message );
  1948. 1948                             }
  1949. 1949 
  1950. 1950                             $matches = array();
  1951. 1951                             $num = preg_match( '/, expecting ([A-Z_]+|\\$end)( or ([A-Z_]+|\\$end))*/', $message, $matches );
  1952. 1952 
  1953. 1953                             if ( $num > 0 ) {
  1954. 1954                                 $match = $matches[0];
  1955. 1955                                 $newMatch = str_replace( ", expecting ", '', $match );
  1956. 1956                                 $symbols = explode( ' or ', $newMatch );
  1957. 1957                                 foreach ( $symbols as $i => $sym ) {
  1958. 1958                                     $symbols[$i] = ErrorHandler::phpSymbolToDescription( $sym );
  1959. 1959                                 }
  1960. 1960                                 $newMatch = join( ', or ', $symbols );
  1961. 1961 
  1962. 1962                                 $message = str_replace( $match, ", expecting $newMatch", $message );
  1963. 1963                             }
  1964. 1964                         }
  1965. 1965                     }
  1966. 1966                 /**
  1967. 1967                  * Undefined Variable, add syntax highlighting and make variable from 'foo' too '$foo'.
  1968. 1968                  */
  1969. 1969                 } else if ( $code === 8 ) {
  1970. 1970                     if (
  1971. 1971                         strpos($message, "Undefined variable:") !== false
  1972. 1972                     ) {
  1973. 1973                         $matches = array();
  1974. 1974                         preg_match( ErrorHandler::REGEX_VARIABLE, $message, $matches );
  1975. 1975 
  1976. 1976                         if ( count($matches) > 0 ) {
  1977. 1977                             $message = 'Undefined variable <span class="syntax-variable">$' . $matches[0] . '</span>' ;
  1978. 1978                         }
  1979. 1979                     }
  1980. 1980                 /**
  1981. 1981                  * Invalid type given.
  1982. 1982                  */
  1983. 1983                 } else if ( $code === 4096 ) {
  1984. 1984                     if ( strpos($message, 'must be an ') ) {
  1985. 1985                         $message = preg_replace( '/, called in .*$/', '', $message );
  1986. 1986 
  1987. 1987                         $matches = array();
  1988. 1988                         preg_match( ErrorHandler::REGEX_METHOD_OR_FUNCTION, $message, $matches );
  1989. 1989 
  1990. 1990                         if ( $matches ) {
  1991. 1991                             $argumentMathces = array();
  1992. 1992                             preg_match( '/^Argument ([0-9]+)/', $message, $argumentMathces );
  1993. 1993                             $highlightArg = count($argumentMathces) === 2 ?
  1994. 1994                                     (((int) $argumentMathces[1])-1) :
  1995. 1995                                     null ;
  1996. 1996 
  1997. 1997                             $fun = ErrorHandler::syntaxHighlightFunctionMatch( $matches[0], $stackTrace, $highlightArg );
  1998. 1998 
  1999. 1999                             if ( $fun ) {
  2000. 2000                                 $message = str_replace( 'passed to ', 'calling ', $message );
  2001. 2001                                 $message = preg_replace( ErrorHandler::REGEX_METHOD_OR_FUNCTION, $fun, $message );
  2002. 2002                                 $prioritizeCaller = true;
  2003. 2003 
  2004. 2004                                 /*
  2005. 2005                                  * scalars not supported.
  2006. 2006                                  */
  2007. 2007                                 $scalarType = null;
  2008. 2008                                 if ( ! ErrorHandler::$IS_SCALAR_TYPE_HINTING_SUPPORTED ) {
  2009. 2009                                     foreach ( ErrorHandler::$SCALAR_TYPES as $scalar ) {
  2010. 2010                                         if ( stripos($message, "must be an instance of $scalar,") !== false ) {
  2011. 2011                                             $scalarType = $scalar;
  2012. 2012                                             break;
  2013. 2013                                         }
  2014. 2014                                     }
  2015. 2015                                 }
  2016. 2016 
  2017. 2017                                 if ( $scalarType !== null ) {
  2018. 2018                                     $message = preg_replace( '/^Argument [0-9]+ calling /', 'Incorrect type hinting for ', $message );
  2019. 2019                                     $message = preg_replace(
  2020. 2020                                             '/ must be an instance of ' . ErrorHandler::REGEX_PHP_IDENTIFIER . '\b.*$/',
  2021. 2021                                             ", ${scalarType} is not supported",
  2022. 2022                                             $message
  2023. 2023                                     );
  2024. 2024 
  2025. 2025                                     $prioritizeCaller = false;
  2026. 2026                                 } else {
  2027. 2027                                     $message = preg_replace( '/ must be an (instance of )?' . ErrorHandler::REGEX_PHP_IDENTIFIER . '\b/', '', $message );
  2028. 2028 
  2029. 2029                                     if ( preg_match('/, none given$/', $message) ) {
  2030. 2030                                         $message = preg_replace( '/^Argument /', 'Missing argument ', $message );
  2031. 2031                                         $message = preg_replace( '/, none given$/', '', $message );
  2032. 2032                                     } else {
  2033. 2033                                         $message = preg_replace( '/^Argument /', 'Incorrect argument ', $message );
  2034. 2034                                     }
  2035. 2035                                 }
  2036. 2036 
  2037. 2037                                 if ( $prioritizeCaller ) {
  2038. 2038                                     list( $srcErrFile, $srcErrLine, $stackSearchI ) = $skipStackFirst( $stackTrace );
  2039. 2039                                 }
  2040. 2040                             }
  2041. 2041                         }
  2042. 2042                     }
  2043. 2043                 }
  2044. 2044 
  2045. 2045                 if ( $stackTrace !== null ) {
  2046. 2046                     $isEmpty = count( $stackTrace ) === 0 ;
  2047. 2047 
  2048. 2048                     if ( $isEmpty ) {
  2049. 2049                         array_unshift( $stackTrace, array(
  2050. 2050                                 'line' => $errLine,
  2051. 2051                                 'file' => $errFile
  2052. 2052                         ) );
  2053. 2053                     } else if (
  2054. 2054                             count($stackTrace) > 0 && (
  2055. 2055                                     (! isset($stackTrace[0]['line'])) ||
  2056. 2056                                     ($stackTrace[0]['line'] !== $errLine)
  2057. 2057                             )
  2058. 2058                     ) {
  2059. 2059                         array_unshift( $stackTrace, array(
  2060. 2060                                 'line' => $errLine,
  2061. 2061                                 'file' => $errFile
  2062. 2062                         ) );
  2063. 2063                     }
  2064. 2064 
  2065. 2065                     if ( $stackTrace && !$isEmpty ) {
  2066. 2066                         $ignoreCommons = false;
  2067. 2067                         $len = count($stackTrace);
  2068. 2068 
  2069. 2069                         /*
  2070. 2070                          * The code above can prioritize a location in the stack trace,
  2071. 2071                          * this is 'stackSearchI'. So we should start our search from there,
  2072. 2072                          * and work down the stack.
  2073. 2073                          * 
  2074. 2074                          * This is built in a way so that when it reaches the end, it'll loop
  2075. 2075                          * back round to the beginning, and check the traces we didn't check
  2076. 2076                          * last time.
  2077. 2077                          * 
  2078. 2078                          * If stackSearchI was not altered, then it just searches from top
  2079. 2079                          * through to the bottom.
  2080. 2080                          */
  2081. 2081                         for ( $i = $stackSearchI; $i < $stackSearchI+$len; $i++ ) {
  2082. 2082                             $trace = &$stackTrace[ $i % $len ];
  2083. 2083 
  2084. 2084                             if ( isset($trace['file']) && isset($trace['line']) ) {
  2085. 2085                                 list( $type, $_ ) = $this->getFolderType( $root, $trace['file'] );
  2086. 2086 
  2087. 2087                                 if ( $type !== ErrorHandler::FILE_TYPE_IGNORE ) {
  2088. 2088                                     if ( $type === ErrorHandler::FILE_TYPE_APPLICATION ) {
  2089. 2089                                         $srcErrLine = $trace['line'];
  2090. 2090                                         $srcErrFile = $trace['file'];
  2091. 2091 
  2092. 2092                                         break;
  2093. 2093                                     } else if ( ! $ignoreCommons ) {
  2094. 2094                                         $srcErrLine = $trace['line'];
  2095. 2095                                         $srcErrFile = $trace['file'];
  2096. 2096 
  2097. 2097                                         $ignoreCommons = true;
  2098. 2098                                     }
  2099. 2099                                 }
  2100. 2100                             }
  2101. 2101                         }
  2102. 2102                     }
  2103. 2103                 }
  2104. 2104 
  2105. 2105                 return array( $message, $srcErrFile, $srcErrLine, $altInfo );
  2106. 2106             }
  2107. 2107 
  2108. 2108             /**
  2109. 2109              * Parses the stack trace, and makes it look pretty.
  2110. 2110              * 
  2111. 2111              * This includes adding in the syntax highlighting,
  2112. 2112              * highlighting the colours for the files,
  2113. 2113              * and padding with whitespace.
  2114. 2114              *
  2115. 2115              * If stackTrace is null, then null is returned.
  2116. 2116              */
  2117. 2117             private function parseStackTrace( $code, $message, $errLine, $errFile, &$stackTrace, $root, $altInfo=null ) {
  2118. 2118                 if ( $stackTrace !== null ) {
  2119. 2119                     /*
  2120. 2120                      * For whitespace padding.
  2121. 2121                      */
  2122. 2122                     $lineLen = 0;
  2123. 2123                     $fileLen = 0;
  2124. 2124 
  2125. 2125                     // parse the stack trace, and remove the long urls
  2126. 2126                     foreach ( $stackTrace as $i => $trace ) {
  2127. 2127                         if ( $trace ) {
  2128. 2128                             if ( isset($trace['line'] ) ) {
  2129. 2129                                 $lineLen = max( $lineLen, strlen($trace['line']) );
  2130. 2130                             } else {
  2131. 2131                                 $trace['line'] = '';
  2132. 2132                             }
  2133. 2133 
  2134. 2134                             $info = '';
  2135. 2135 
  2136. 2136                             if ( $i === 0 && $altInfo !== null ) {
  2137. 2137                                 $info = $altInfo;
  2138. 2138                             /*
  2139. 2139                              * Skip for the first iteration,
  2140. 2140                              * as it's usually magical PHP calls.
  2141. 2141                              */
  2142. 2142                             } else if (
  2143. 2143                                 $i > 0 && (
  2144. 2144                                         isset($trace['class']) ||
  2145. 2145                                         isset($trace['type']) ||
  2146. 2146                                         isset($trace['function'])
  2147. 2147                                 )
  2148. 2148                             ) {
  2149. 2149                                 $args = array();
  2150. 2150                                 if ( isset($trace['args']) ) {
  2151. 2151                                     foreach ( $trace['args'] as $arg ) {
  2152. 2152                                         $args[]= ErrorHandler::identifyTypeHTML( $arg, 1 );
  2153. 2153                                     }
  2154. 2154                                 }
  2155. 2155 
  2156. 2156                                 $info = ErrorHandler::syntaxHighlightFunction(
  2157. 2157                                         isset($trace['class'])      ? $trace['class']       : null,
  2158. 2158                                         isset($trace['type'])       ? $trace['type']        : null,
  2159. 2159                                         isset($trace['function'])   ? $trace['function']    : null,
  2160. 2160                                         $args
  2161. 2161                                 );
  2162. 2162                             } else if ( isset($trace['info']) && $trace['info'] !== '' ) {
  2163. 2163                                 $info = ErrorHandler::syntaxHighlight( $trace['info'] );
  2164. 2164                             } else if ( isset($trace['file']) && !isset($trace['info']) ) {
  2165. 2165                                 $contents = $this->getFileContents( $trace['file'] );
  2166. 2166 
  2167. 2167                                 if ( $contents ) {
  2168. 2168                                     $info = ErrorHandler::syntaxHighlight(
  2169. 2169                                             trim( $contents[$trace['line']-1] )
  2170. 2170                                     );
  2171. 2171                                 }
  2172. 2172                             } 
  2173. 2173 
  2174. 2174                             $trace['info'] = $info;
  2175. 2175 
  2176. 2176                             if ( isset($trace['file']) ) {
  2177. 2177                                 list( $type, $file ) = $this->getFolderType( $root, $trace['file'] );
  2178. 2178 
  2179. 2179                                 $trace['file_type'] = $type;
  2180. 2180                                 $trace['is_native'] = false;
  2181. 2181                             } else {
  2182. 2182                                 $file = '[Internal PHP]';
  2183. 2183 
  2184. 2184                                 $trace['file_type'] = '';
  2185. 2185                                 $trace['is_native'] = true;
  2186. 2186                             }
  2187. 2187 
  2188. 2188                             $trace['file'] = $file;
  2189. 2189 
  2190. 2190                             $fileLen = max( $fileLen, strlen($file) );
  2191. 2191 
  2192. 2192                             $stackTrace[$i] = $trace;
  2193. 2193                         }
  2194. 2194                     }
  2195. 2195 
  2196. 2196                     /*
  2197. 2197                      * We are allowed to highlight just once, that's it.
  2198. 2198                      */
  2199. 2199                     $highlightI = -1;
  2200. 2200                     foreach ( $stackTrace as $i => $trace ) {
  2201. 2201                         if (
  2202. 2202                                 $trace['line'] === $errLine &&
  2203. 2203                                 $trace['file'] === $errFile
  2204. 2204                         ) {
  2205. 2205                             $highlightI = $i;
  2206. 2206                             break;
  2207. 2207                         }
  2208. 2208                     }
  2209. 2209 
  2210. 2210                     foreach ( $stackTrace as $i => $trace ) {
  2211. 2211                         if ( $trace ) {
  2212. 2212                             // line
  2213. 2213                             $line = str_pad( $trace['line']     , $lineLen, ' ', STR_PAD_LEFT  );
  2214. 2214 
  2215. 2215                             // file
  2216. 2216                             $file = $trace['file'];
  2217. 2217                             $fileKlass = '';
  2218. 2218                             if ( $trace['is_native'] ) {
  2219. 2219                                 $fileKlass = 'file-internal-php';
  2220. 2220                             } else {
  2221. 2221                                 $fileKlass = 'filename ' . ErrorHandler::folderTypeToCSS( $trace['file_type'] );
  2222. 2222                             }
  2223. 2223                             $file = $file . str_pad( '', $fileLen-strlen($file), ' ', STR_PAD_LEFT );
  2224. 2224 
  2225. 2225                             // info
  2226. 2226                             $info = $trace['info'];
  2227. 2227                             if ( $info ) {
  2228. 2228                                 $info = str_replace( "\n", '\n', $info );
  2229. 2229                                 $info = str_replace( "\r", '\r', $info );
  2230. 2230                             } else {
  2231. 2231                                 $info = '&nbsp;';
  2232. 2232                             }
  2233. 2233 
  2234. 2234                             // line + file + info
  2235. 2235                             $stackStr =
  2236. 2236                                     "<td class='linenumber'>$line</td>" .
  2237. 2237                                     "<td class='$fileKlass'>$file</td>" .
  2238. 2238                                     "<td class='lineinfo'>$info</td>"   ;
  2239. 2239 
  2240. 2240                             if ( $trace['is_native'] ) {
  2241. 2241                                 $cssClass = 'is-native ';
  2242. 2242                             } else {
  2243. 2243                                 $cssClass = '';
  2244. 2244                             }
  2245. 2245 
  2246. 2246                             if ( $highlightI === $i ) {
  2247. 2247                                 $cssClass .= ' highlight';
  2248. 2248                             } else if ( $highlightI > $i ) {
  2249. 2249                                 $cssClass .= ' pre-highlight';
  2250. 2250                             }
  2251. 2251 
  2252. 2252                             if (
  2253. 2253                                     $i !== 0 &&
  2254. 2254                                     isset($trace['exception']) &&
  2255. 2255                                     $trace['exception']
  2256. 2256                             ) {
  2257. 2257                                 $ex = $trace['exception'];
  2258. 2258 
  2259. 2259                                 $exHtml = '<tr class="error-stack-trace-exception"><td>' .
  2260. 2260                                             'exception &quot;' .
  2261. 2261                                             htmlspecialchars( $ex->getMessage() ) .
  2262. 2262                                             '&quot;' .
  2263. 2263                                         '</td></tr>';
  2264. 2264                             } else {
  2265. 2265                                 $exHtml = '';
  2266. 2266                             }
  2267. 2267 
  2268. 2268                             $data = '';
  2269. 2269                             if ( isset($trace['file-lines-id']) ) {
  2270. 2270                                 $data = 'data-file-lines-id="' . $trace['file-lines-id'] . '"';
  2271. 2271                             }
  2272. 2272 
  2273. 2273                             $stackTrace[$i] = "$exHtml<tr class='error-stack-trace-line $cssClass' $data>$stackStr</tr>";
  2274. 2274                         }
  2275. 2275                     }
  2276. 2276 
  2277. 2277                     return '<table id="error-stack-trace">' . join( "", $stackTrace ) . '</table>';
  2278. 2278                 } else {
  2279. 2279                     return null;
  2280. 2280                 }
  2281. 2281             }
  2282. 2282 
  2283. 2283             private function logError( $message, $file, $line, $ex=null ) {
  2284. 2284                 if ( $ex ) {
  2285. 2285                     $trace = $ex->getTraceAsString();
  2286. 2286                     $parts = explode( "\n", $trace );
  2287. 2287                     $trace = "        " . join( "\n        ", $parts );
  2288. 2288 
  2289. 2289                     if ( ! ErrorHandler::isIIS() ) {
  2290. 2290                         error_log( "$message \n           $file, $line \n$trace" );
  2291. 2291                     }
  2292. 2292                 } else {
  2293. 2293                     if ( ! ErrorHandler::isIIS() ) {
  2294. 2294                         error_log( "$message \n           $file, $line" );
  2295. 2295                     }
  2296. 2296                 }
  2297. 2297             }
  2298. 2298 
  2299. 2299             /**
  2300. 2300              * Given a class name, which can include a namespace,
  2301. 2301              * this will report that it is not found.
  2302. 2302              * 
  2303. 2303              * This will also report it as an exception,
  2304. 2304              * so you will get a full stack trace.
  2305. 2305              */
  2306. 2306             public function reportClassNotFound( $className ) {
  2307. 2307                 throw new ErrorException( "Class '$className' not found", E_ERROR, E_ERROR, __FILE__, __LINE__ );
  2308. 2308             }
  2309. 2309 
  2310. 2310             /**
  2311. 2311              * Given an exception, this will report it.
  2312. 2312              */
  2313. 2313             public function reportException( $ex ) {
  2314. 2314                 $this->reportError(
  2315. 2315                         $ex->getCode(),
  2316. 2316                         $ex->getMessage(),
  2317. 2317                         $ex->getLine(),
  2318. 2318                         $ex->getFile(),
  2319. 2319                         $ex
  2320. 2320                 );
  2321. 2321             }
  2322. 2322 
  2323. 2323             /**
  2324. 2324              * The entry point for handling an error.
  2325. 2325              * 
  2326. 2326              * This is the lowest entry point for error reporting,
  2327. 2327              * and for that reason it can either take just error info,
  2328. 2328              * or a combination of error and exception information.
  2329. 2329              * 
  2330. 2330              * Note that this will still log errors in the error log
  2331. 2331              * even when it's disabled with ini. It just does nothing
  2332. 2332              * more than that.
  2333. 2333              */
  2334. 2334             public function reportError( $code, $message, $errLine, $errFile, $ex=null ) {
  2335. 2335                 $this->discardBuffer();
  2336. 2336 
  2337. 2337                 if (
  2338. 2338                         $ex === null &&
  2339. 2339                         $code === 1 &&
  2340. 2340                         strpos($message, "Class ") === 0 &&
  2341. 2341                         strpos($message, "not found") !== false &&
  2342. 2342                         $this->classNotFoundException !== null
  2343. 2343                 ) {
  2344. 2344                     $ex = $this->classNotFoundException;
  2345. 2345 
  2346. 2346                     $code       = $ex->getCode();
  2347. 2347                     $message    = $ex->getMessage();
  2348. 2348                     $errLine    = $ex->getLine();
  2349. 2349                     $errFile    = $ex->getFile();
  2350. 2350                     $stackTrace = $ex->getTrace();
  2351. 2351                 }
  2352. 2352 
  2353. 2353                 $this->logError( $message, $errFile, $errLine, $ex );
  2354. 2354 
  2355. 2355                 /**
  2356. 2356                  * It runs if:
  2357. 2357                  *  - it is globally enabled
  2358. 2358                  *  - this error handler is enabled
  2359. 2359                  *  - we believe it is a regular html request, or ajax
  2360. 2360                  */
  2361. 2361                 global $_php_error_is_ini_enabled;
  2362. 2362                 if (
  2363. 2363                         $_php_error_is_ini_enabled &&
  2364. 2364                         $this->isOn() && (
  2365. 2365                                 $this->isAjax ||
  2366. 2366                                 !$this->htmlOnly ||
  2367. 2367                                 !ErrorHandler::isNonPHPRequest()
  2368. 2368                         )
  2369. 2369                 ) {
  2370. 2370                     $root = $this->applicationRoot;
  2371. 2371 
  2372. 2372                     list( $ex, $stackTrace, $code, $errFile, $errLine ) =
  2373. 2373                             $this->getStackTrace( $ex, $code, $errFile, $errLine );
  2374. 2374 
  2375. 2375                     list( $message, $srcErrFile, $srcErrLine, $altInfo ) =
  2376. 2376                             $this->improveErrorMessage(
  2377. 2377                                     $ex,
  2378. 2378                                     $code,
  2379. 2379                                     $message,
  2380. 2380                                     $errLine,
  2381. 2381                                     $errFile,
  2382. 2382                                     $root,
  2383. 2383                                     $stackTrace
  2384. 2384                             );
  2385. 2385 
  2386. 2386                     $errFile = $srcErrFile;
  2387. 2387                     $errLine = $srcErrLine;
  2388. 2388 
  2389. 2389                     list( $fileLinesSets, $numFileLines ) = $this->generateFileLineSets( $srcErrFile, $srcErrLine, $stackTrace );
  2390. 2390 
  2391. 2391                     list( $type, $errFile ) = $this->getFolderType( $root, $errFile );
  2392. 2392                     $errFileType = ErrorHandler::folderTypeToCSS( $type );
  2393. 2393 
  2394. 2394                     $stackTrace = $this->parseStackTrace( $code, $message, $errLine, $errFile, $stackTrace, $root, $altInfo );
  2395. 2395                     $fileLines  = $this->readCodeFile( $srcErrFile, $srcErrLine );
  2396. 2396 
  2397. 2397                     // load the session, if it's there
  2398. 2398 
  2399. 2399                     if ( isset($_COOKIE[session_name()]) && session_id() !== '' ) {
  2400. 2400                         session_start();
  2401. 2401                     }
  2402. 2402 
  2403. 2403                     $request  = ErrorHandler::getRequestHeaders();
  2404. 2404                     $response = ErrorHandler::getResponseHeaders();
  2405. 2405 
  2406. 2406                     $dump = $this->generateDumpHTML(
  2407. 2407                             array(
  2408. 2408                                     'post'    => ( isset($_POST)    ? $_POST    : array() ),
  2409. 2409                                     'get'     => ( isset($_GET)     ? $_GET     : array() ),
  2410. 2410                                     'session' => ( isset($_SESSION) ? $_SESSION : array() ),
  2411. 2411                                     'cookies' => ( isset($_COOKIE)  ? $_COOKIE  : array() )
  2412. 2412                             ),
  2413. 2413 
  2414. 2414                             $request,
  2415. 2415                             $response,
  2416. 2416 
  2417. 2417                             $_SERVER
  2418. 2418                     );
  2419. 2419                     $this->displayError( $message, $srcErrLine, $errFile, $errFileType, $stackTrace, $fileLinesSets, $numFileLines, $dump );
  2420. 2420 
  2421. 2421                     // exit in order to end processing
  2422. 2422                     $this->turnOff();
  2423. 2423                     exit(0);
  2424. 2424                 }
  2425. 2425             }
  2426. 2426 
  2427. 2427             private function getStackTrace( $ex, $code, $errFile, $errLine ) {
  2428. 2428                 $stackTrace = null;
  2429. 2429 
  2430. 2430                 if ( $ex !== null ) {
  2431. 2431                     $next = $ex;
  2432. 2432                     $stackTrace = array();
  2433. 2433                     $skipStacks = 0;
  2434. 2434 
  2435. 2435                     for (
  2436. 2436                             $next = $ex;
  2437. 2437                             $next !== null;
  2438. 2438                             $next = $next->getPrevious()
  2439. 2439                     ) {
  2440. 2440                         $ex = $next;
  2441. 2441 
  2442. 2442                         $stack = $ex->getTrace();
  2443. 2443                         $file  = $ex->getFile();
  2444. 2444                         $line  = $ex->getLine();
  2445. 2445 
  2446. 2446                         if ( $stackTrace !== null && count($stackTrace) > 0 ) {
  2447. 2447                             $stack = array_slice( $stack, 0, count($stack)-count($stackTrace) + 1 );
  2448. 2448                         }
  2449. 2449 
  2450. 2450                         if ( count($stack) > 0 && (
  2451. 2451                             !isset($stack[0]['file']) ||
  2452. 2452                             !isset($stack[0]['line']) ||
  2453. 2453                             $stack[0]['file'] !== $file ||
  2454. 2454                             $stack[0]['line'] !== $line
  2455. 2455                         ) ) {
  2456. 2456                             array_unshift( $stack, array(
  2457. 2457                                     'file' => $file,
  2458. 2458                                     'line' => $line
  2459. 2459                             ) );
  2460. 2460                         }
  2461. 2461 
  2462. 2462                         $stackTrace = ( $stackTrace !== null ) ?
  2463. 2463                                 array_merge( $stack, $stackTrace ) :
  2464. 2464                                 $stack ;
  2465. 2465 
  2466. 2466                         if ( count($stackTrace) > 0 ) {
  2467. 2467                             $stackTrace[0]['exception'] = $ex;
  2468. 2468                         }
  2469. 2469                     }
  2470. 2470 
  2471. 2471                     $message = $ex->getMessage();
  2472. 2472                     $errFile = $ex->getFile();
  2473. 2473                     $errLine = $ex->getLine();
  2474. 2474 
  2475. 2475                     $code = method_exists($ex, 'getSeverity') ?
  2476. 2476                             $ex->getSeverity() :
  2477. 2477                             $ex->getCode()     ;
  2478. 2478                 }
  2479. 2479 
  2480. 2480                 return array( $ex, $stackTrace, $code, $errFile, $errLine );
  2481. 2481             }
  2482. 2482 
  2483. 2483             private function generateDumpHTML( $arrays, $request, $response, $server ) {
  2484. 2484                 $arrToHtml = function( $name, $array, $css='' ) {
  2485. 2485                     $max = 0;
  2486. 2486 
  2487. 2487                     foreach ( $array as $e => $v ) {
  2488. 2488                         $max = max( $max, strlen( $e ) );
  2489. 2489                     }
  2490. 2490 
  2491. 2491                     $snippet = "<h2 class='error_dump_header'>$name</h2>";
  2492. 2492 
  2493. 2493                     foreach ( $array as $e => $v ) {
  2494. 2494                         $e = str_pad( $e, $max, ' ', STR_PAD_RIGHT );
  2495. 2495 
  2496. 2496                         $e = htmlentities( $e );
  2497. 2497                         $v = ErrorHandler::identifyTypeHTML( $v, 3 );
  2498. 2498 
  2499. 2499                         $snippet .= "<div class='error_dump_key'>$e</div><div class='error_dump_mapping'>=&gt;</div><div class='error_dump_value'>$v</div>";
  2500. 2500                     }
  2501. 2501 
  2502. 2502                     return "<div class='error_dump $css'>$snippet</div>";
  2503. 2503                 };
  2504. 2504 
  2505. 2505                 $html = '';
  2506. 2506                 foreach ( $arrays as $key => $value ) {
  2507. 2507                     if ( isset($value) && $value ) {
  2508. 2508                         $html .= $arrToHtml( $key, $value );
  2509. 2509                     } else {
  2510. 2510                         unset($arrays[$key]);
  2511. 2511                     }
  2512. 2512                 }
  2513. 2513 
  2514. 2514                 return "<div class='error-dumps'>" .
  2515. 2515                             $html .
  2516. 2516                             $arrToHtml( 'request', $request, 'dump_request' ) .
  2517. 2517                             $arrToHtml( 'response', $response, 'dump_response' ) .
  2518. 2518                             $arrToHtml( 'server', $server, 'dump_server' ) .
  2519. 2519                         "</div>";
  2520. 2520             }
  2521. 2521 
  2522. 2522             private function generateFileLineSets( $srcErrFile, $srcErrLine, &$stackTrace ) {
  2523. 2523                 $fileLineID = 1;
  2524. 2524                 $srcErrID = "file-line-$fileLineID";
  2525. 2525                 $fileLineID++;
  2526. 2526 
  2527. 2527                 $lines = $this->readCodeFile( $srcErrFile, $srcErrLine );
  2528. 2528                 $minSize = count( $lines );
  2529. 2529                 $fileLinesSets = array( new FileLinesSet( $srcErrLine, $srcErrID, $lines, true ) );
  2530. 2530 
  2531. 2531                 if ( $stackTrace ) {
  2532. 2532                     foreach ( $stackTrace as $i => &$trace ) {
  2533. 2533                         if ( $trace && isset($trace['file']) && isset($trace['line']) ) {
  2534. 2534                             $file = $trace['file'];
  2535. 2535                             $line = $trace['line'];
  2536. 2536 
  2537. 2537                             if ( $file === $srcErrFile && $line === $srcErrLine ) {
  2538. 2538                                 $trace['file-lines-id'] = $srcErrID;
  2539. 2539                             } else {
  2540. 2540                                 $traceFileID = "file-line-$fileLineID";
  2541. 2541                                 $trace['file-lines-id'] = $traceFileID;
  2542. 2542 
  2543. 2543                                 $lines = $this->readCodeFile( $file, $line );
  2544. 2544                                 $minSize = max( $minSize, count($lines) );
  2545. 2545                                 $fileLinesSets[]= new FileLinesSet( $line, $traceFileID, $lines, false );
  2546. 2546 
  2547. 2547                                 $fileLineID++;
  2548. 2548                             }
  2549. 2549                         }
  2550. 2550                     }
  2551. 2551                 }
  2552. 2552 
  2553. 2553                 return array( $fileLinesSets, $minSize );
  2554. 2554             }
  2555. 2555 
  2556. 2556             /*
  2557. 2557              * Even if disabled, we still act like reporting is on,
  2558. 2558              * if it's turned on.
  2559. 2559              * 
  2560. 2560              * We just don't do anything.
  2561. 2561              */
  2562. 2562             private function setEnabled( $isOn ) {
  2563. 2563                 $wasOn = $this->isOn;
  2564. 2564                 $this->isOn = $isOn;
  2565. 2565 
  2566. 2566                 global $_php_error_is_ini_enabled;
  2567. 2567                 if ( $_php_error_is_ini_enabled ) {
  2568. 2568                     /*
  2569. 2569                      * Only turn off, if we're moving from on to off.
  2570. 2570                      * 
  2571. 2571                      * This is so if it's turned off without turning on,
  2572. 2572                      * we don't change anything.
  2573. 2573                      */
  2574. 2574                     if ( !$isOn ) {
  2575. 2575                         if ( $wasOn ) {
  2576. 2576                             $this->runDisableErrors();
  2577. 2577                         }
  2578. 2578                     /*
  2579. 2579                      * Always turn it on, even if already on.
  2580. 2580                      * 
  2581. 2581                      * This is incase it was messed up in some way
  2582. 2582                      * by the user.
  2583. 2583                      */
  2584. 2584                     } else if ( $isOn ) {
  2585. 2585                         $this->runEnableErrors();
  2586. 2586                     }
  2587. 2587                 }
  2588. 2588             }
  2589. 2589 
  2590. 2590             private function runDisableErrors() {
  2591. 2591                 global $_php_error_is_ini_enabled;
  2592. 2592 
  2593. 2593                 if ( $_php_error_is_ini_enabled ) {
  2594. 2594                     error_reporting( $this->defaultErrorReportingOff );
  2595. 2595 
  2596. 2596                     @ini_restore( 'html_errors' );
  2597. 2597                     
  2598. 2598                     if ( ErrorHandler::isIIS() ) {
  2599. 2599                         @ini_restore( 'log_errors' );
  2600. 2600                     }
  2601. 2601                 }
  2602. 2602             }
  2603. 2603 
  2604. 2604             /*
  2605. 2605              * Now the actual hooking into PHP's error reporting.
  2606. 2606              * 
  2607. 2607              * We enable _ALL_ errors, and make them all exceptions.
  2608. 2608              * We also need to hook into the shutdown function so
  2609. 2609              * we can catch fatal and compile time errors.
  2610. 2610              */
  2611. 2611             private function runEnableErrors() {
  2612. 2612                 global $_php_error_is_ini_enabled;
  2613. 2613                 
  2614. 2614                 if ( $_php_error_is_ini_enabled ) {
  2615. 2615                     $catchSurpressedErrors = &$this->catchSurpressedErrors;
  2616. 2616                     $self = $this;
  2617. 2617 
  2618. 2618                     // all errors \o/ !
  2619. 2619                     error_reporting( $this->defaultErrorReportingOn );
  2620. 2620                     @ini_set( 'html_errors', false );
  2621. 2621 
  2622. 2622                     if ( ErrorHandler::isIIS() ) {
  2623. 2623                         @ini_set( 'log_errors', false );
  2624. 2624                     }
  2625. 2625 
  2626. 2626                     set_error_handler(
  2627. 2627                             function( $code, $message, $file, $line, $context ) use ( $self, &$catchSurpressedErrors ) {
  2628. 2628                                 /*
  2629. 2629                                  * DO NOT! log the error.
  2630. 2630                                  * 
  2631. 2631                                  * Either it's thrown as an exception, and so logged by the exception handler,
  2632. 2632                                  * or we return false, and it's logged by PHP.
  2633. 2633                                  * 
  2634. 2634                                  * Also DO NOT! throw an exception, instead report it.
  2635. 2635                                  * This is because if an operation raises both a user AND
  2636. 2636                                  * fatal error (such as require), then the exception is
  2637. 2637                                  * silently ignored.
  2638. 2638                                  */
  2639. 2639                                 if ( $self->isOn() ) {
  2640. 2640                                     /*
  2641. 2641                                      * When using an @, the error reporting drops to 0.
  2642. 2642                                      */
  2643. 2643                                     if ( error_reporting() !== 0 || $catchSurpressedErrors ) {
  2644. 2644                                         $ex = new ErrorException( $message, $code, $code, $file, $line );
  2645. 2645 
  2646. 2646                                         $self->reportException( $ex );
  2647. 2647                                     }
  2648. 2648                                 } else {
  2649. 2649                                     return false;
  2650. 2650                                 }
  2651. 2651                             },
  2652. 2652                             $this->defaultErrorReportingOn 
  2653. 2653                     );
  2654. 2654 
  2655. 2655                     set_exception_handler( function($ex) use ( $self ) {
  2656. 2656                         if ( $self->isOn() ) {
  2657. 2657                             $self->reportException( $ex );
  2658. 2658                         } else {
  2659. 2659                             return false;
  2660. 2660                         }
  2661. 2661                     });
  2662. 2662 
  2663. 2663                     if ( ! $self->isShutdownRegistered ) {
  2664. 2664                         if ( $self->catchClassNotFound ) {
  2665. 2665                             $classException = &$self->classNotFoundException;
  2666. 2666                             $autoloaderFuns = ErrorHandler::$SAFE_AUTOLOADER_FUNCTIONS;
  2667. 2667 
  2668. 2668                             /*
  2669. 2669                              * When this is called, the key point is that we don't error!
  2670. 2670                              *
  2671. 2671                              * Instead we record that an error has occurred,
  2672. 2672                              * if we believe one has, and then let PHP error as normal.
  2673. 2673                              * The stack trace we record is then used later.
  2674. 2674                              *
  2675. 2675                              * This is done for two reasons:
  2676. 2676                              *  - functions like 'class_exists' will run the autoloader, and we shouldn't error on them
  2677. 2677                              *  - on PHP 5.3.0, the class loader registered functions does *not* return closure objects, so we can't do anything clever.
  2678. 2678                              * 
  2679. 2679                              * So we watch, but don't touch.
  2680. 2680                              */
  2681. 2681                             spl_autoload_register( function($className) use ( $self, &$classException, &$autoloaderFuns ) {
  2682. 2682                                 if ( $self->isOn() ) {
  2683. 2683                                     $classException = null;
  2684. 2684 
  2685. 2685                                     // search the stack first, to check if we are running from 'class_exists' before we error
  2686. 2686                                     if ( defined('DEBUG_BACKTRACE_IGNORE_ARGS') ) {
  2687. 2687                                         $trace = debug_backtrace( DEBUG_BACKTRACE_IGNORE_ARGS );
  2688. 2688                                     } else {
  2689. 2689                                         $trace = debug_backtrace();
  2690. 2690                                     }
  2691. 2691                                     $error = true;
  2692. 2692 
  2693. 2693                                     foreach ( $trace as $row ) {
  2694. 2694                                         if ( isset($row['function']) ) {
  2695. 2695                                             $function = $row['function'];
  2696. 2696 
  2697. 2697                                             // they are just checking, so don't error
  2698. 2698                                             if ( in_array($function, $autoloaderFuns, true) ) {
  2699. 2699                                                 $error = false;
  2700. 2700                                                 break;
  2701. 2701                                             // not us, and not the autoloader, so error!
  2702. 2702                                             } else if (
  2703. 2703                                                     $function !== '__autoload' &&
  2704. 2704                                                     $function !== 'spl_autoload_call' &&
  2705. 2705                                                     strpos($function, 'php_error\\') === false
  2706. 2706                                             ) {
  2707. 2707                                                 break;
  2708. 2708                                             }
  2709. 2709                                         }
  2710. 2710                                     }
  2711. 2711 
  2712. 2712                                     if ( $error ) {
  2713. 2713                                         $classException = new ErrorException( "Class '$className' not found", E_ERROR, E_ERROR, __FILE__, __LINE__ );
  2714. 2714                                     }
  2715. 2715                                 }
  2716. 2716                             } );
  2717. 2717                         }
  2718. 2718 
  2719. 2719                         $self->isShutdownRegistered = true;
  2720. 2720                     }
  2721. 2721                 }
  2722. 2722             }
  2723. 2723 
  2724. 2724             private function displayJSInjection() {
  2725. 2725                 ?><script data-php_error="magic JS, just ignore this!">
  2726. 2726                     "use strict";
  2727. 2727 
  2728. 2728                     (function( window ) {
  2729. 2729                         if ( window.XMLHttpRequest ) {
  2730. 2730                             /** 
  2731. 2731                              * A method wrapping helper function.
  2732. 2732                              * 
  2733. 2733                              * Wraps the method given, from the old prototype to the new
  2734. 2734                              * XMLHttpRequest prototype.
  2735. 2735                              * 
  2736. 2736                              * This only happens if the old one actually has that prototype.
  2737. 2737                              * If the browser doesn't support a prototype, then it doesn't
  2738. 2738                              * get wrapped.
  2739. 2739                              */
  2740. 2740                             var wrapMethod = function( XMLHttpRequest, old, prop ) {
  2741. 2741                                 if ( old.prototype[prop] ) {
  2742. 2742                                     var behaviours = ( arguments.length > 3 ) ?
  2743. 2743                                             Array.prototype.slice.call( arguments, 3 ) :
  2744. 2744                                             null ;
  2745. 2745 
  2746. 2746                                     XMLHttpRequest.prototype[prop] = function() {
  2747. 2747                                         if ( behaviours !== null ) {
  2748. 2748                                             for ( var i = 0; i < behaviours.length; i++ ) {
  2749. 2749                                                 behaviours[i].call( this, arguments, prop );
  2750. 2750                                             }
  2751. 2751                                         }
  2752. 2752 
  2753. 2753                                         return this.__.inner[prop].apply( this.__.inner, arguments );
  2754. 2754                                     };
  2755. 2755                                 }
  2756. 2756                             }
  2757. 2757 
  2758. 2758                             var postMethod = function( XMLHttpRequest, prop ) {
  2759. 2759                                 if ( XMLHttpRequest.prototype[prop] ) {
  2760. 2760                                     var behaviours = Array.prototype.slice.call( arguments, 2 );
  2761. 2761 
  2762. 2762                                     var previous = XMLHttpRequest.prototype[prop];
  2763. 2763                                     XMLHttpRequest.prototype[prop] = function() {
  2764. 2764                                         var r = previous.apply( this, arguments );
  2765. 2765 
  2766. 2766                                         for ( var i = 0; i < behaviours.length; i++ ) {
