  2767. 2767                                             behaviours[i].call( this, arguments, prop );
  2768. 2768                                         }
  2769. 2769 
  2770. 2770                                         return r;
  2771. 2771                                     };
  2772. 2772                                 }
  2773. 2773                             }
  2774. 2774 
  2775. 2775                             /*
  2776. 2776                              * Certain properties will error when read,
  2777. 2777                              * and which ones do vary from browser to browser.
  2778. 2778                              * 
  2779. 2779                              * I've found both Chrome and Firefox will error
  2780. 2780                              * on _different_ properties.
  2781. 2781                              * 
  2782. 2782                              * So every read needs to be wrapped in a try/catch,
  2783. 2783                              * and just hope it doesn't error.
  2784. 2784                              */
  2785. 2785                             var copyProperties = function( src, dest, props ) {
  2786. 2786                                 for ( var i = 0; i < props.length; i++ ) {
  2787. 2787                                     try {
  2788. 2788                                         var prop = props[i];
  2789. 2789                                         dest[prop] = src[prop];
  2790. 2790                                     } catch( ex ) { }
  2791. 2791                                 }
  2792. 2792                             };
  2793. 2793 
  2794. 2794                             var copyResponseProperties = function( src, dest ) {
  2795. 2795                                 copyProperties( src, dest, [
  2796. 2796                                         'response',
  2797. 2797                                         'responseText',
  2798. 2798                                         'responseXML'
  2799. 2799                                 ]);
  2800. 2800                             }
  2801. 2801 
  2802. 2802                             var copyRequestProperties = function( src, dest, includeReadOnly, skipResponse ) {
  2803. 2803                                 copyProperties( src, dest, [
  2804. 2804                                         'readyState',
  2805. 2805                                         'timeout',
  2806. 2806                                         'upload',
  2807. 2807                                         'withCredentials',
  2808. 2808                                         'responseType',
  2809. 2809 
  2810. 2810                                         'mozBackgroundRequest',
  2811. 2811                                         'mozArrayBuffer',
  2812. 2812                                         'multipart'
  2813. 2813                                 ]);
  2814. 2814 
  2815. 2815                                 if ( includeReadOnly ) {
  2816. 2816                                     copyProperties( src, dest, [
  2817. 2817                                             'status',
  2818. 2818                                             'statusText',
  2819. 2819                                             'channel'
  2820. 2820                                     ]);
  2821. 2821 
  2822. 2822                                     if ( ! skipResponse ) {
  2823. 2823                                         copyResponseProperties( src, dest );
  2824. 2824                                     }
  2825. 2825                                 }
  2826. 2826 
  2827. 2827                                 return dest;
  2828. 2828                             }
  2829. 2829 
  2830. 2830                             var runFail = function( ev ) {
  2831. 2831                                 var self = this;
  2832. 2832                                 var xmlHttpRequest = this.__.inner;
  2833. 2833 
  2834. 2834                                 var iframe = document.createElement('iframe');
  2835. 2835                                 iframe.setAttribute('width', '100%');
  2836. 2836                                 iframe.setAttribute('height', '100%');
  2837. 2837                                 iframe.setAttribute('src', 'about:blank');
  2838. 2838 
  2839. 2839                                 iframe.style.transition =
  2840. 2840                                 iframe.style.OTransition =
  2841. 2841                                 iframe.style.MsTransition =
  2842. 2842                                 iframe.style.MozTransition =
  2843. 2843                                 iframe.style.WebkitTransition = 'opacity 200ms linear';
  2844. 2844 
  2845. 2845                                 iframe.style.background = 'transparent';
  2846. 2846                                 iframe.style.opacity = 0;
  2847. 2847                                 iframe.style.zIndex = 100001;
  2848. 2848                                 iframe.style.top = 0;
  2849. 2849                                 iframe.style.right = 0;
  2850. 2850                                 iframe.style.left = 0;
  2851. 2851                                 iframe.style.bottom = 0;
  2852. 2852                                 iframe.style.position = 'fixed';
  2853. 2853 
  2854. 2854                                 var response = xmlHttpRequest.responseText;
  2855. 2855 
  2856. 2856                                 iframe.onload = function() {
  2857. 2857                                     var iDoc = iframe.contentWindow || iframe.contentDocument;
  2858. 2858                                     if ( iDoc.document) {
  2859. 2859                                         iDoc = iDoc.document;
  2860. 2860                                     }
  2861. 2861 
  2862. 2862                                     var iBody = iDoc.getElementsByTagName("body")[0];
  2863. 2863                                     iBody.innerHTML = response; 
  2864. 2864                                     var iHead = iDoc.getElementsByTagName("head")[0];
  2865. 2865 
  2866. 2866                                     // re-run the script tags
  2867. 2867                                     var scripts = iDoc.getElementsByTagName('script');
  2868. 2868                                     for ( var i = 0; i < scripts.length; i++ ) {
  2869. 2869                                         var script = scripts[i];
  2870. 2870                                         var parent = script.parentNode;
  2871. 2871 
  2872. 2872                                         if ( parent ) {
  2873. 2873                                             parent.removeChild( script );
  2874. 2874 
  2875. 2875                                             var newScript = iDoc.createElement('script');
  2876. 2876                                             newScript.innerHTML = script.innerHTML;
  2877. 2877 
  2878. 2878                                             iHead.appendChild( newScript );
  2879. 2879                                         }
  2880. 2880                                     }
  2881. 2881 
  2882. 2882                                     var closed = false;
  2883. 2883                                     var closeIFrame = function() {
  2884. 2884                                         if ( ! closed ) {
  2885. 2885                                             closed = true;
  2886. 2886 
  2887. 2887                                             iframe.style.opacity = 0;
  2888. 2888 
  2889. 2889                                             setTimeout( function() {
  2890. 2890                                                 iframe.parentNode.removeChild( iframe );
  2891. 2891                                             }, 220 );
  2892. 2892                                         }
  2893. 2893                                     }
  2894. 2894 
  2895. 2895                                     /*
  2896. 2896                                      * Retry Handler.
  2897. 2897                                      * 
  2898. 2898                                      * Clear this, make a new (real) XMLHttpRequest,
  2899. 2899                                      * and then re-run everything.
  2900. 2900                                      */
  2901. 2901                                     iDoc.getElementById('ajax-retry').onclick = function() {
  2902. 2902                                         var methodCalls = self.__.methodCalls;
  2903. 2903 
  2904. 2904                                         initializeXMLHttpRequest.call( self );
  2905. 2905                                         for ( var i = 0; i < methodCalls.length; i++ ) {
  2906. 2906                                             var method = methodCalls[i];
  2907. 2907                                             self[method.method].apply( self, method.args );
  2908. 2908                                         }
  2909. 2909 
  2910. 2910                                         closeIFrame();
  2911. 2911 
  2912. 2912                                         return false;
  2913. 2913                                     };
  2914. 2914 
  2915. 2915                                     /*
  2916. 2916                                      * The close handler.
  2917. 2917                                      * 
  2918. 2918                                      * When closed, the response is cleared,
  2919. 2919                                      * and then the request finishes with null info.
  2920. 2920                                      */
  2921. 2921                                     iDoc.getElementById('ajax-close').onclick = function() {
  2922. 2922                                         copyRequestProperties( self.__.inner, self, true );
  2923. 2923 
  2924. 2924                                         // clear the response
  2925. 2925                                         self.response       = '';
  2926. 2926                                         self.responseText   = '';
  2927. 2927                                         self.responseXML    = null;
  2928. 2928 
  2929. 2929                                         if ( self.onreadystatechange ) {
  2930. 2930                                             self.onreadystatechange( ev );
  2931. 2931                                         }
  2932. 2932 
  2933. 2933                                         closeIFrame();
  2934. 2934                                         return false;
  2935. 2935                                     };
  2936. 2936 
  2937. 2937                                     var html = iDoc.getElementsByTagName('html')[0];
  2938. 2938                                     html.setAttribute( 'class', 'ajax' );
  2939. 2939 
  2940. 2940                                     setTimeout( function() {
  2941. 2941                                         iframe.style.opacity = 1;
  2942. 2942                                     }, 1 );
  2943. 2943                                 }
  2944. 2944 
  2945. 2945                                 /*
  2946. 2946                                  * Placed inside a timeout, incase the document doesn't exist yet.
  2947. 2947                                  * 
  2948. 2948                                  * Can happen if the page ajax's straight away.
  2949. 2949                                  */
  2950. 2950                                 setTimeout( function() {
  2951. 2951                                     var body = document.getElementsByTagName('body')[0];
  2952. 2952                                     body.appendChild( iframe );
  2953. 2953                                 }, 1 );
  2954. 2954                             }
  2955. 2955 
  2956. 2956                             var old = window.XMLHttpRequest;
  2957. 2957 
  2958. 2958                             /**
  2959. 2959                              * The middle man http request object.
  2960. 2960                              * 
  2961. 2961                              * Acts just like a normal one, but will show errors if they
  2962. 2962                              * occur instead of running the result.
  2963. 2963                              */
  2964. 2964                             var XMLHttpRequest = function() {
  2965. 2965                                 initializeXMLHttpRequest.call( this );
  2966. 2966                             }
  2967. 2967 
  2968. 2968                             var initializeXMLHttpRequest = function() {
  2969. 2969                                 var self = this,
  2970. 2970                                     inner = new old();
  2971. 2971 
  2972. 2972                                 /**
  2973. 2973                                  * With a buggy XMLHttpRequest, it's possible to accidentally run the error handler
  2974. 2974                                  * multiple times.
  2975. 2975                                  * 
  2976. 2976                                  * This is a flag to only do it once, to keep the code more defensive.
  2977. 2977                                  */
  2978. 2978                                 var errorOnce   = true,
  2979. 2979                                     isAjaxError = false;
  2980. 2980 
  2981. 2981                                 var stateResults = [];
  2982. 2982 
  2983. 2983                                 inner.onreadystatechange = function( ev ) {
  2984. 2984                                     copyRequestProperties( inner, self, true, true );
  2985. 2985 
  2986. 2986                                     var state = inner.readyState;
  2987. 2987 
  2988. 2988                                     /*
  2989. 2989                                      * Check headers for error.
  2990. 2990                                      */
  2991. 2991                                     if ( ! isAjaxError && state >= 2 ) {
  2992. 2992                                         var header = inner.getResponseHeader( '<?php echo ErrorHandler::PHP_ERROR_MAGIC_HEADER_KEY ?>' );
  2993. 2993 
  2994. 2994                                         if ( header !== null ) {
  2995. 2995                                             self.__.isAjaxError = true;
  2996. 2996                                             isAjaxError = true;
  2997. 2997                                         }
  2998. 2998                                     }
  2999. 2999 
  3000. 3000                                     if ( ! isAjaxError && state >= 2 ) {
  3001. 3001                                         copyResponseProperties( inner, self );
  3002. 3002                                     }
  3003. 3003 
  3004. 3004                                     /*
  3005. 3005                                      * Success ! \o/
  3006. 3006                                      * 
  3007. 3007                                      * Pass any state change on to the parent caller,
  3008. 3008                                      * unless we hit an ajaxy error.
  3009. 3009                                      */
  3010. 3010                                     if ( !isAjaxError && self.onreadystatechange ) {
  3011. 3011                                         /*
  3012. 3012                                          * One of three things happens:
  3013. 3013                                          *  = cache the requests until we know there is no error (state 4)
  3014. 3014                                          *  = we know there is no error, and so we run our cache
  3015. 3015                                          *  = cache is done, but we've been called again, so just pass it on
  3016. 3016                                          */
  3017. 3017                                         if ( state < 4 ) {
  3018. 3018                                             stateResults.push( copyRequestProperties(self, {}, true) );
  3019. 3019                                         } else {
  3020. 3020                                             if ( stateResults !== null ) {
  3021. 3021                                                 var currentState = copyRequestProperties( self, {}, true );
  3022. 3022 
  3023. 3023                                                 for ( var i = 0; i < stateResults.length; i++ ) {
  3024. 3024                                                     var store = stateResults[i];
  3025. 3025                                                     copyRequestProperties( store, self, true );
  3026. 3026 
  3027. 3027                                                     // must check a second time here,
  3028. 3028                                                     // in case it gets changed within an onreadystatechange
  3029. 3029                                                     if ( self.onreadystatechange ) {
  3030. 3030                                                         self.onreadystatechange( ev );
  3031. 3031                                                     }
  3032. 3032                                                 }
  3033. 3033 
  3034. 3034                                                 copyRequestProperties( currentState, self, true );
  3035. 3035                                                 stateResults = null;
  3036. 3036                                             }
  3037. 3037 
  3038. 3038                                             if ( self.onreadystatechange ) {
  3039. 3039                                                 self.onreadystatechange( ev );
  3040. 3040                                             }
  3041. 3041                                         }
  3042. 3042                                     }
  3043. 3043 
  3044. 3044                                     /*
  3045. 3045                                      * Fail : (
  3046. 3046                                      */
  3047. 3047                                     if (
  3048. 3048                                             isAjaxError &&
  3049. 3049                                             state === 4 &&
  3050. 3050                                             errorOnce
  3051. 3051                                     ) {
  3052. 3052                                         errorOnce = false;
  3053. 3053                                         runFail.call( self, ev );
  3054. 3054                                     }
  3055. 3055                                 };
  3056. 3056 
  3057. 3057                                 copyRequestProperties( inner, this, true );
  3058. 3058 
  3059. 3059                                 /*
  3060. 3060                                  * Private fields are stored underneath an unhappy face,
  3061. 3061                                  * to localize them.
  3062. 3062                                  * 
  3063. 3063                                  * Access becomes:
  3064. 3064                                  *  this.__.fieldName
  3065. 3065                                  */
  3066. 3066                                 this.__ = {
  3067. 3067                                         methodCalls: [],
  3068. 3068                                         inner: inner,
  3069. 3069                                         isAjaxError: false,
  3070. 3070                                         isSynchronous: false
  3071. 3071                                 };
  3072. 3072                             }
  3073. 3073 
  3074. 3074                             /*
  3075. 3075                              * We build the methods for the fake XMLHttpRequest.
  3076. 3076                              */
  3077. 3077 
  3078. 3078                             var copyIn = function() {
  3079. 3079                                 copyRequestProperties( this, this.__.inner );
  3080. 3080                             }
  3081. 3081                             var copyOut = function() {
  3082. 3082                                 copyRequestProperties( this.__.inner, this, true, this.__.isSynchronous && this.__.isAjaxError );
  3083. 3083                             }
  3084. 3084                             var addHeader = function() {
  3085. 3085                                 this.__.inner.setRequestHeader( 'HTTP_X_REQUESTED_WITH', 'XMLHttpRequest' );
  3086. 3086                             }
  3087. 3087                             var isSynchronous = function( args ) {
  3088. 3088                                 this.__.isSynchronous = ( args[2] === false );
  3089. 3089                             }
  3090. 3090                             var saveRequest = function( args, method ) {
  3091. 3091                                 this.__.methodCalls.push({
  3092. 3092                                     method: method,
  3093. 3093                                     args: args
  3094. 3094                                 });
  3095. 3095                             }
  3096. 3096 
  3097. 3097                             wrapMethod( XMLHttpRequest, old, 'open'        , saveRequest, copyIn, isSynchronous );
  3098. 3098                             wrapMethod( XMLHttpRequest, old, 'abort'       , saveRequest, copyIn );
  3099. 3099                             wrapMethod( XMLHttpRequest, old, 'send'        , saveRequest, copyIn, addHeader );
  3100. 3100                             wrapMethod( XMLHttpRequest, old, 'sendAsBinary', saveRequest, copyIn, addHeader );
  3101. 3101 
  3102. 3102                             postMethod( XMLHttpRequest,      'send'        , copyOut );
  3103. 3103                             postMethod( XMLHttpRequest,      'sendAsBinary', copyOut );
  3104. 3104 
  3105. 3105                             wrapMethod( XMLHttpRequest, old, 'getAllResponseHeaders', saveRequest );
  3106. 3106                             wrapMethod( XMLHttpRequest, old, 'getResponseHeader'    , saveRequest );
  3107. 3107                             wrapMethod( XMLHttpRequest, old, 'setRequestHeader'     , saveRequest );
  3108. 3108                             wrapMethod( XMLHttpRequest, old, 'overrideMimeType'     , saveRequest );
  3109. 3109 
  3110. 3110                             window.XMLHttpRequest = XMLHttpRequest;
  3111. 3111                         }
  3112. 3112                     })( window );
  3113. 3113                 </script><?php
  3114. 3114             }
  3115. 3115 
  3116. 3116             /**
  3117. 3117              * The actual display logic.
  3118. 3118              * This outputs the error details in HTML.
  3119. 3119              */
  3120. 3120             private function displayError( $message, $errLine, $errFile, $errFileType, $stackTrace, &$fileLinesSets, $numFileLines, $dumpInfo ) {
  3121. 3121                 $applicationRoot   = $this->applicationRoot;
  3122. 3122                 $serverName        = $this->serverName;
  3123. 3123                 $backgroundText    = $this->backgroundText;
  3124. 3124                 $displayLineNumber = $this->displayLineNumber;
  3125. 3125 
  3126. 3126                 /*
  3127. 3127                  * When a query string is not provided,
  3128. 3128                  * in some versions it's a blank string,
  3129. 3129                  * whilst in others it's not set at all.
  3130. 3130                  */
  3131. 3131                 if ( isset($_SERVER['QUERY_STRING']) ) {
  3132. 3132                     $requestUrl = str_replace( $_SERVER['QUERY_STRING'], '', $_SERVER['REQUEST_URI'] );
  3133. 3133                     $requestUrlLen = strlen( $requestUrl );
  3134. 3134                     
  3135. 3135                     // remove the '?' if it's there (I suspect it isn't always, but don't take my word for it!)
  3136. 3136                     if ( $requestUrlLen > 0 && substr($requestUrl, $requestUrlLen-1) === '?' ) {
  3137. 3137                         $requestUrl = substr( $requestUrl, 0, $requestUrlLen-1 );
  3138. 3138                     }
  3139. 3139                 } else {
  3140. 3140                     $requestUrl = $_SERVER['REQUEST_URI'];
  3141. 3141                 }
  3142. 3142 
  3143. 3143                 $this->displayHTML(
  3144. 3144                         // pre, in the head
  3145. 3145                         function() use( $message, $errFile, $errLine ) {
  3146. 3146                                 echo "<!--\n" .
  3147. 3147                                         "$message\n" .
  3148. 3148                                         "$errFile, $errLine\n" .
  3149. 3149                                     "-->";
  3150. 3150                         },
  3151. 3151 
  3152. 3152                         // the content
  3153. 3153                         function() use (
  3154. 3154                                 $requestUrl,
  3155. 3155                                 $backgroundText, $serverName, $applicationRoot,
  3156. 3156                                 $message, $errLine, $errFile, $errFileType, $stackTrace,
  3157. 3157                                 &$fileLinesSets, $numFileLines,
  3158. 3158                                 $displayLineNumber,
  3159. 3159                                 $dumpInfo
  3160. 3160                         ) {
  3161. 3161                             if ( $backgroundText ) { ?>
  3162. 3162                                 <div id="error-wrap">
  3163. 3163                                     <div id="error-back"><?php echo $backgroundText ?></div>
  3164. 3164                                 </div>
  3165. 3165                             <?php } ?>
  3166. 3166 
  3167. 3167                             <h2 id="error-file-root"><?php echo $serverName ?> | <?php echo $applicationRoot ?></h2>
  3168. 3168                             <h2 id="ajax-info">
  3169. 3169                                 <span id="ajax-tab" class="ajax-button">AJAX PAUSED</span>
  3170. 3170 
  3171. 3171                                 <span class="ajax-url"><?php echo $serverName ?><?php echo $requestUrl ?></span>
  3172. 3172                                 <span class="ajax-buttons">
  3173. 3173                                     <a href="#" id="ajax-close" class="ajax-button">X</a>
  3174. 3174                                     <a href="#" id="ajax-retry" class="ajax-button">RETRY</a>
  3175. 3175                                 </span>
  3176. 3176                             </h2>
  3177. 3177                             <h1 id="error-title"><?php echo $message ?></h1>
  3178. 3178                             <h2 id="error-file" class="<?php echo $fileLinesSets ? 'has_code' : '' ?>"><span id="error-linenumber"><?php echo $errLine ?></span> <span id="error-filename" class="<?php echo $errFileType ?>"><?php echo $errFile ?></span></h2>
  3179. 3179                             <?php if ( $fileLinesSets ) { ?>
  3180. 3180                                 <div id="error-files">
  3181. 3181                                     <?php
  3182. 3182                                         foreach ( $fileLinesSets as $fileLinesSet ) {
  3183. 3183                                             $id            = $fileLinesSet->getHTMLID();
  3184. 3184                                             $fileLines     = $fileLinesSet->getLines();
  3185. 3185                                             $show          = $fileLinesSet->isShown();
  3186. 3186                                             $highlightLine = $fileLinesSet->getLine();
  3187. 3187                                             
  3188. 3188                                             // calculate last line number length
  3189. 3189                                             end($fileLines);
  3190. 3190                                             $maxLineNumber = key($fileLines);
  3191. 3191                                             $lineDecimals  = strlen($maxLineNumber);
  3192. 3192                                         ?>
  3193. 3193                                             <div id="<?php echo $id ?>" class="error-file-lines <?php echo $show ? 'show' : '' ?>">
  3194. 3194                                                 <?php
  3195. 3195                                                     foreach ( $fileLines as $lineNum => $origLine ) {
  3196. 3196                                                         $line = ltrim($origLine, ' ');
  3197. 3197                                                         $numSpaces = strlen($origLine) - strlen($line);
  3198. 3198 
  3199. 3199                                                         $size = 8*$numSpaces + 64;
  3200. 3200                                                         $style = "style='padding-left: " . $size . "px; text-indent: -" . $size . "px;'";
  3201. 3201 
  3202. 3202                                                         for ( $i = 0; $i < $numSpaces; $i++ ) {
  3203. 3203                                                             $line = "&nbsp;$line";
  3204. 3204                                                         }
  3205. 3205 
  3206. 3206                                                         if ($displayLineNumber) {
  3207. 3207                                                             $lineNumLabel = str_replace(' ', '&nbsp;', sprintf("%{$lineDecimals}d", $lineNum));
  3208. 3208                                                         } else {
  3209. 3209                                                             $lineNumLabel = '';
  3210. 3210                                                         }
  3211. 3211 
  3212. 3212                                                         ?><div <?php echo $style ?> class="error-file-line <?php echo ($lineNum === $highlightLine) ? 'highlight' : '' ?>">
  3213. 3213                                                             <span class="error-file-line-number"><?php echo $lineNumLabel ?></span>
  3214. 3214                                                             <span class="error-file-line-content"><?php echo $line ?></span>
  3215. 3215                                                         </div>
  3216. 3216                                                         <?php
  3217. 3217                                                     }
  3218. 3218                                                 ?>
  3219. 3219                                             </div>
  3220. 3220                                     <?php } ?>
  3221. 3221                                 </div>
  3222. 3222                             <?php }
  3223. 3223                             
  3224. 3224                             if ( $stackTrace !== null ) {
  3225. 3225                                 echo $stackTrace;
  3226. 3226                             }
  3227. 3227 
  3228. 3228                             if ( $dumpInfo !== null ) {
  3229. 3229                                 echo $dumpInfo;
  3230. 3230                             }
  3231. 3231                         },
  3232. 3232 
  3233. 3233                         /**
  3234. 3234                          * Adds:
  3235. 3235                          *  = mouse movement for switching the code snippet in real time
  3236. 3236                          */
  3237. 3237                         function() {
  3238. 3238                             ?><script>
  3239. 3239                                 "use strict";
  3240. 3240 
  3241. 3241                                 $(document).ready( function() {
  3242. 3242                                     $('#ajax-close', '#ajax-retry').click( function(ev) {
  3243. 3243                                         ev.preventDefault();
  3244. 3244                                     });
  3245. 3245 
  3246. 3246                                     if ( $('#error-files').size() > 0 && $('#error-stack-trace').size() > 0 ) {
  3247. 3247                                         var FADE_SPEED = 150,
  3248. 3248                                             lines = $('#error-files .error-file-lines'),
  3249. 3249                                             currentID = '#' + lines.filter( '.show' ).attr( 'id' );
  3250. 3250 
  3251. 3251                                         var filename   = $('#error-filename'),
  3252. 3252                                             linenumber = $('#error-linenumber');
  3253. 3253 
  3254. 3254                                         $( '.error-stack-trace-line' ).
  3255. 3255                                                 mouseover( function() {
  3256. 3256                                                     var $this = $(this);
  3257. 3257 
  3258. 3258                                                     if ( ! $this.hasClass('select-highlight') ) {
  3259. 3259                                                         $this.addClass( 'select-highlight' );
  3260. 3260                                                     }
  3261. 3261                                                 }).
  3262. 3262                                                 mouseout( function(ev) {
  3263. 3263                                                     var $this = $(this);
  3264. 3264 
  3265. 3265                                                     $this.removeClass( 'select-highlight' );
  3266. 3266                                                 }).
  3267. 3267                                                 click( function() {
  3268. 3268                                                     var $this = $(this);
  3269. 3269 
  3270. 3270                                                     if ( ! $this.hasClass('highlight') && !$this.hasClass('is-native') ) {
  3271. 3271                                                         $( '.error-stack-trace-line.highlight' ).removeClass( 'highlight' );
  3272. 3272 
  3273. 3273                                                         $this.addClass( 'highlight' );
  3274. 3274 
  3275. 3275                                                         var lineID = $this.data( 'file-lines-id' );
  3276. 3276                                                         if ( lineID ) {
  3277. 3277                                                             var newCurrent = '#' + lineID;
  3278. 3278 
  3279. 3279                                                             if ( newCurrent !== currentID ) {
  3280. 3280                                                                 currentID = newCurrent;
  3281. 3281 
  3282. 3282                                                                 lines.removeClass( 'show' );
  3283. 3283                                                                 lines.filter( currentID ).addClass( 'show' );
  3284. 3284 
  3285. 3285                                                                 var $file = $this.find('.filename');
  3286. 3286                                                                 var file = $file.text(),
  3287. 3287                                                                     line = $this.find('.linenumber').text();
  3288. 3288 
  3289. 3289                                                                 filename.text( file );
  3290. 3290                                                                 filename.attr( 'class', $file.attr('class') );
  3291. 3291                                                                 linenumber.text( line );
  3292. 3292                                                             }
  3293. 3293                                                         }
  3294. 3294                                                     }
  3295. 3295                                                 });
  3296. 3296                                         $('#error-stack-trace').mouseleave( function() {
  3297. 3297                                             lines.filter('.show').removeClass( 'show' );
  3298. 3298                                             lines.filter( currentID ).addClass( 'show' );
  3299. 3299                                         });
  3300. 3300                                     }
  3301. 3301                                 } );
  3302. 3302                             </script><?php
  3303. 3303                         }
  3304. 3304                 );
  3305. 3305             }
  3306. 3306 
  3307. 3307             /**
  3308. 3308              * A generic function for clearing the buffer, and displaying error output.
  3309. 3309              * 
  3310. 3310              * A function needs to be given, and then this is run at the correct time.
  3311. 3311              * There are two ways this can be used:
  3312. 3312              * 
  3313. 3313              *  displayHTML( $head, $body )
  3314. 3314              * 
  3315. 3315              * Here 'head' is run straight after the doctype, whilst 'body' is run as
  3316. 3316              * the body for the content. The other way is:
  3317. 3317              * 
  3318. 3318              *  displayHTML( $body )
  3319. 3319              * 
  3320. 3320              * Here there is only content.
  3321. 3321              */
  3322. 3322             function displayHTML( Closure $head, $body=null, $javascript=null ) {
  3323. 3323                 if ( func_num_args() === 2 ) {
  3324. 3324                     $body = $head;
  3325. 3325                     $head = null;
  3326. 3326                 }
  3327. 3327            
  3328. 3328                 // clean out anything displayed already
  3329. 3329                 try {
  3330. 3330                     @ob_clean();
  3331. 3331                 } catch ( Exception $ex ) { /* do nothing */ }
  3332. 3332 
  3333. 3333                 if (!$this->htmlOnly && ErrorHandler::isNonPHPRequest()) {
  3334. 3334                     @header( "Content-Type: text/html" );
  3335. 3335                 }
  3336. 3336                 @header( ErrorHandler::PHP_ERROR_MAGIC_HEADER_KEY . ': ' . ErrorHandler::PHP_ERROR_MAGIC_HEADER_VALUE );
  3337. 3337 
  3338. 3338                 echo '<!DOCTYPE html>';
  3339. 3339 
  3340. 3340                 if ( $head !== null ) {
  3341. 3341                     $head();
  3342. 3342                 }
  3343. 3343 
  3344. 3344                 echo "<link href='http://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Droid+Sans+Mono' rel='stylesheet' type='text/css'>";
  3345. 3345 
  3346. 3346                 ?><style>
  3347. 3347                     html, body {
  3348. 3348                         margin: 0;
  3349. 3349                         padding: 0; 
  3350. 3350                         width: 100%;
  3351. 3351                         height: 100%;
  3352. 3352                     }
  3353. 3353                         body {
  3354. 3354                             color: #f0f0f0;
  3355. 3355 
  3356. 3356                             tab-size: 4;
  3357. 3357                         }
  3358. 3358 
  3359. 3359                     ::-moz-selection{background: #662039 !important; color: #fff !important; text-shadow: none;}
  3360. 3360                     ::selection {background: #662039 !important; color: #fff !important; text-shadow: none;} 
  3361. 3361 
  3362. 3362                     a,
  3363. 3363                     .error-stack-trace-line {
  3364. 3364                         -webkit-transition: color 120ms linear, background 120ms linear;
  3365. 3365                            -moz-transition: color 120ms linear, background 120ms linear;
  3366. 3366                             -ms-transition: color 120ms linear, background 120ms linear;
  3367. 3367                              -o-transition: color 120ms linear, background 120ms linear;
  3368. 3368                                 transition: color 120ms linear, background 120ms linear;
  3369. 3369                     }
  3370. 3370 
  3371. 3371                     a,
  3372. 3372                     a:visited,
  3373. 3373                     a:hover,
  3374. 3374                     a:active {
  3375. 3375                         color: #9ae;
  3376. 3376                         text-decoration: none;
  3377. 3377                     }
  3378. 3378                     a:hover {
  3379. 3379                         color: #aff;
  3380. 3380                     }
  3381. 3381 
  3382. 3382                     h2,
  3383. 3383                     .background {
  3384. 3384                         font-size: 16px;
  3385. 3385                         font-family: inconsolata, 'Droid Sans Mono', "DejaVu Sans Mono", consolas, monospace;
  3386. 3386                     }
  3387. 3387 
  3388. 3388                     h1,
  3389. 3389                     h2 {

  3585. 3585                         /**

  3587. 3587                          * in both directions.
  3588. 3588                          *
  3589. 3589                          * The second keeps it on screen for long enough for the
  3590. 3590                          * fade to occur, and then does the margin transtion to move
  3591. 3591                          * it out.

  3788. 3788                         
  3789. 3789                     <?php
  3790. 3790                     /*
  3791. 3791                      * Code and Stack highlighting colours
  3792. 3792                      * 
  3793. 3793                      * The way this works, is that syntax highlighting is turned off
  3794. 3794                      * for .pre-highlight. It then gets turns on for .pre-highlight,
  3795. 3795                      * if it matches certain criteria.
  3796. 3796                      * 
  3797. 3797                      * The emphasis is that pre-highlight is by default 'no highlight'.
  3798. 3798                      */
  3799. 3799                     ?>
  3800. 3800                     .pre-highlight,
  3801. 3801                     .highlight {
  3802. 3802                     }
  3803. 3803                     .is-native,
  3804. 3804                     .pre-highlight {
  3805. 3805                         display:none;
  3806. 3806                         opacity: 0.3;
  3807. 3807                         color: #999;
  3808. 3808                     }
  3809. 3809                     .is-native {
  3810. 3810                         opacity: 0.3 !important;
  3811. 3811                         display: none;
  3812. 3812                     }
  3813. 3813                     .highlight,
  3814. 3814                     .pre-highlight.highlight,
  3815. 3815                     .highlight ~ .pre-highlight {
  3816. 3816                         color: #eee;
  3817. 3817                         opacity: 1;
  3818. 3818                     }
  3819. 3819 
  3820. 3820                     .select-highlight {
  3821. 3821                         background: #261313;
  3822. 3822                     }
  3823. 3823                     .select-highlight.is-native {
  3824. 3824                         background: #222;
  3825. 3825                     }
  3826. 3826                     .highlight {
  3827. 3827                         background: #391414;
  3828. 3828                     }
  3829. 3829                     .highlight.select-highlight {
  3830. 3830                         background: #451915;
  3831. 3831                     }
  3832. 3832 
  3833. 3833                     .pre-highlight span,
  3834. 3834                     .pre-highlight:not(.highlight):first-of-type span {
  3835. 3835                         color : #999;
  3836. 3836                         border: none !important;
  3837. 3837                     }
  3838. 3838 
  3839. 3839                     <?php
  3840. 3840                     /*
  3841. 3841                      * Syntax Highlighting
  3842. 3842                      */
  3843. 3843                     ?>
  3844. 3844                     .pre-highlight:first-of-type .syntax-class,
  3845. 3845                     .highlight ~ .pre-highlight  .syntax-class,
  3846. 3846                     .pre-highlight.highlight     .syntax-class,
  3847. 3847                                                  .syntax-class {
  3848. 3848                         color: #C07041;
  3849. 3849                     }
  3850. 3850                     .pre-highlight:first-of-type .syntax-function,
  3851. 3851                     .highlight ~ .pre-highlight  .syntax-function,
  3852. 3852                     .pre-highlight.highlight     .syntax-function,
  3853. 3853                                                  .syntax-function {
  3854. 3854                         color: #F9EE98;
  3855. 3855                     }
  3856. 3856                     .pre-highlight:first-of-type .syntax-literal,
  3857. 3857                     .highlight ~ .pre-highlight  .syntax-literal,

  3945. 3945 
  3946. 3946                 if ( $javascript ) {
  3947. 3947                     $javascript();
  3948. 3948                 }
  3949. 3949             }
  3950. 3950         }
  3951. 3951          
  3952. 3952         /**
  3953. 3953          * This is a carbon copy of \ErrorException.
  3954. 3954          * However that is only supported in PHP 5.1 and above,
  3955. 3955          * so this allows PHP Error to work in PHP 5.0.
  3956. 3956          *
  3957. 3957          * A thin class that wraps up an error, into an exception.
  3958. 3958          */
  3959. 3959         class ErrorException extends Exception
  3960. 3960         {
  3961. 3961             public function __construct( $message, $code, $severity, $file, $line )
  3962. 3962             {
  3963. 3963                 parent::__construct( $message, $code, null );
  3964. 3964 
  3965. 3965                 $this->file = $file;
  3966. 3966                 $this->line = $line;
  3967. 3967             }
  3968. 3968         }
  3969. 3969 
  3970. 3970         /**
  3971. 3971          * Code is outputted multiple times, for each file involved.
  3972. 3972          * This allows us to wrap up a single set of code.
  3973. 3973          */
  3974. 3974         class FileLinesSet
  3975. 3975         {
  3976. 3976             private $id;
  3977. 3977             private $lines;
  3978. 3978             private $isShown;
  3979. 3979             private $line;
  3980. 3980 
  3981. 3981             public function __construct( $line, $id, array $lines, $isShown ) {
  3982. 3982                 $this->id = $id;
  3983. 3983                 $this->lines = $lines;
  3984. 3984                 $this->isShown = $isShown;
  3985. 3985                 $this->line = $line;
  3986. 3986             }
  3987. 3987 
  3988. 3988             public function getHTMLID() {
  3989. 3989                 return $this->id;
  3990. 3990             }
  3991. 3991 
  3992. 3992             public function getLines() {
  3993. 3993                 return $this->lines;
  3994. 3994             }
  3995. 3995 
  3996. 3996             public function isShown() {
  3997. 3997                 return $this->isShown;
  3998. 3998             }
  3999. 3999 
  4000. 4000             public function getLine() {
  4001. 4001                 return $this->line;
  4002. 4002             }
  4003. 4003         }
  4004. 4004 
  4005. 4005         /**
  4006. 4006          * jsmin.php - PHP implementation of Douglas Crockford's JSMin.
  4007. 4007          *
  4008. 4008          * This is pretty much a direct port of jsmin.c to PHP with just a few
  4009. 4009          * PHP-specific performance tweaks. Also, whereas jsmin.c reads from stdin and
  4010. 4010          * outputs to stdout, this library accepts a string as input and returns another
  4011. 4011          * string as output.
  4012. 4012          *
  4013. 4013          * PHP 5 or higher is required.
  4014. 4014          *
  4015. 4015          * Permission is hereby granted to use this version of the library under the
  4016. 4016          * same terms as jsmin.c, which has the following license:
  4017. 4017          *
  4018. 4018          * --
  4019. 4019          * Copyright (c) 2002 Douglas Crockford (www.crockford.com)
  4020. 4020          *
  4021. 4021          * Permission is hereby granted, free of charge, to any person obtaining a copy of
  4022. 4022          * this software and associated documentation files (the "Software"), to deal in
  4023. 4023          * the Software without restriction, including without limitation the rights to
  4024. 4024          * use, copy, modify, merge, publish, distribute, sublicense, and/or sell copies
  4025. 4025          * of the Software, and to permit persons to whom the Software is furnished to do
  4026. 4026          * so, subject to the following conditions:
  4027. 4027          *
  4028. 4028          * The above copyright notice and this permission notice shall be included in all
  4029. 4029          * copies or substantial portions of the Software.
  4030. 4030          *

  4032. 4032          *
  4033. 4033          * THE SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED "AS IS", WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, EXPRESS OR

  4035. 4035          * FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE AND NONINFRINGEMENT. IN NO EVENT SHALL THE
  4036. 4036          * AUTHORS OR COPYRIGHT HOLDERS BE LIABLE FOR ANY CLAIM, DAMAGES OR OTHER
  4037. 4037          * LIABILITY, WHETHER IN AN ACTION OF CONTRACT, TORT OR OTHERWISE, ARISING FROM,
  4038. 4038          * OUT OF OR IN CONNECTION WITH THE SOFTWARE OR THE USE OR OTHER DEALINGS IN THE
  4039. 4039          * SOFTWARE.
  4040. 4040          * --
  4041. 4041          *
  4042. 4042          * @package JSMin
  4043. 4043          * @author Ryan Grove <ryan@wonko.com>
  4044. 4044          * @copyright 2002 Douglas Crockford <douglas@crockford.com> (jsmin.c)
  4045. 4045          * @copyright 2008 Ryan Grove <ryan@wonko.com> (PHP port)
  4046. 4046          * @copyright 2012 Adam Goforth <aag@adamgoforth.com> (Updates)
  4047. 4047          * @license http://opensource.org/licenses/mit-license.php MIT License
  4048. 4048          * @version 1.1.2 (2012-05-01)
  4049. 4049          * @link https://github.com/rgrove/jsmin-php
  4050. 4050          */
  4051. 4051         class JSMin
  4052. 4052         {
  4053. 4053             const ORD_LF = 10;
  4054. 4054             const ORD_SPACE = 32;
  4055. 4055             const ACTION_KEEP_A = 1;
  4056. 4056             const ACTION_DELETE_A = 2;
  4057. 4057             const ACTION_DELETE_A_B = 3;
  4058. 4058 
  4059. 4059             protected $a = '';
  4060. 4060             protected $b = '';
  4061. 4061             protected $input = '';
  4062. 4062             protected $inputIndex = 0;
  4063. 4063             protected $inputLength = 0;
  4064. 4064             protected $lookAhead = null;
  4065. 4065             protected $output = '';
  4066. 4066 
  4067. 4067             // -- Public Static Methods --------------------------------------------------
  4068. 4068 
  4069. 4069             /**
  4070. 4070              * Minify Javascript
  4071. 4071              *
  4072. 4072              * @uses __construct()
  4073. 4073              * @uses min()
  4074. 4074              * @param string $js Javascript to be minified
  4075. 4075              * @return string
  4076. 4076              */
  4077. 4077             public static function minify($js) {
  4078. 4078                 $jsmin = new JSMin($js);
  4079. 4079                 return $jsmin->min();
  4080. 4080             }
  4081. 4081 
  4082. 4082             // -- Public Instance Methods ------------------------------------------------
  4083. 4083 
  4084. 4084             /**
  4085. 4085              * Constructor
  4086. 4086              *
  4087. 4087              * @param string $input Javascript to be minified
  4088. 4088              */
  4089. 4089             public function __construct($input) {
  4090. 4090                 $this->input = str_replace("\r\n", "\n", $input);
  4091. 4091                 $this->inputLength = strlen($this->input);
  4092. 4092             }
  4093. 4093 
  4094. 4094             // -- Protected Instance Methods ---------------------------------------------
  4095. 4095 
  4096. 4096             /**
  4097. 4097              * Action -- do something! What to do is determined by the $command argument.
  4098. 4098              *
  4099. 4099              * action treats a string as a single character. Wow!
  4100. 4100              * action recognizes a regular expression if it is preceded by ( or , or =.
  4101. 4101              *
  4102. 4102              * @uses next()
  4103. 4103              * @uses get()
  4104. 4104              * @throws JSMinException If parser errors are found:
  4105. 4105              * - Unterminated string literal
  4106. 4106              * - Unterminated regular expression set in regex literal
  4107. 4107              * - Unterminated regular expression literal
  4108. 4108              * @param int $command One of class constants:
  4109. 4109              * ACTION_KEEP_A Output A. Copy B to A. Get the next B.
  4110. 4110              * ACTION_DELETE_A Copy B to A. Get the next B. (Delete A).
  4111. 4111              * ACTION_DELETE_A_B Get the next B. (Delete B).
  4112. 4112              */
  4113. 4113             protected function action($command) {
  4114. 4114                 switch($command) {
  4115. 4115                     case self::ACTION_KEEP_A:
  4116. 4116                         $this->output .= $this->a;
  4117. 4117 
  4118. 4118                     case self::ACTION_DELETE_A:
  4119. 4119                         $this->a = $this->b;
  4120. 4120 
  4121. 4121                         if ($this->a === "'" || $this->a === '"') {
  4122. 4122                             for (;;) {
  4123. 4123                                 $this->output .= $this->a;
  4124. 4124                                 $this->a = $this->get();
  4125. 4125 
  4126. 4126                                 if ($this->a === $this->b) {
  4127. 4127                                     break;
  4128. 4128                                 }
  4129. 4129 
  4130. 4130                                 if (ord($this->a) <= self::ORD_LF) {
  4131. 4131                                     throw new JSMinException('Unterminated string literal.');
  4132. 4132                                 }
  4133. 4133 
  4134. 4134                                 if ($this->a === '\\') {
  4135. 4135                                     $this->output .= $this->a;
  4136. 4136                                     $this->a = $this->get();
  4137. 4137                                 }
  4138. 4138                             }
  4139. 4139                         }
  4140. 4140 
  4141. 4141                     case self::ACTION_DELETE_A_B:
  4142. 4142                         $this->b = $this->next();
  4143. 4143 
  4144. 4144                         if ($this->b === '/' && (
  4145. 4145                                 $this->a === '(' || $this->a === ',' || $this->a === '=' ||
  4146. 4146                                 $this->a === ':' || $this->a === '[' || $this->a === '!' ||
  4147. 4147                                 $this->a === '&' || $this->a === '|' || $this->a === '?' ||
  4148. 4148                                 $this->a === '{' || $this->a === '}' || $this->a === ';' ||
  4149. 4149                                 $this->a === "\n" )) {
  4150. 4150 
  4151. 4151                             $this->output .= $this->a . $this->b;
  4152. 4152 
  4153. 4153                             for (;;) {
  4154. 4154                                 $this->a = $this->get();
  4155. 4155 
  4156. 4156                                 if ($this->a === '[') {
  4157. 4157                                     /*
  4158. 4158         inside a regex [...] set, which MAY contain a '/' itself. Example: mootools Form.Validator near line 460:
  4159. 4159         return Form.Validator.getValidator('IsEmpty').test(element) || (/^(?:[a-z0-9!#$%&'*+/=?^_`{|}~-]\.?){0,63}[a-z0-9!#$%&'*+/=?^_`{|}~-]@(?:(?:[a-z0-9](?:[a-z0-9-]{0,61}[a-z0-9])?\.)*[a-z0-9](?:[a-z0-9-]{0,61}[a-z0-9])?|\[(?:(?:25[0-5]|2[0-4][0-9]|[01]?[0-9][0-9]?)\.){3}(?:25[0-5]|2[0-4][0-9]|[01]?[0-9][0-9]?)\])$/i).test(element.get('value'));
  4160. 4160              */
  4161. 4161                                     for (;;) {
  4162. 4162                                         $this->output .= $this->a;
  4163. 4163                                         $this->a = $this->get();
  4164. 4164 
  4165. 4165                                         if ($this->a === ']') {
  4166. 4166                                                 break;
  4167. 4167                                         } elseif ($this->a === '\\') {
  4168. 4168                                             $this->output .= $this->a;
  4169. 4169                                             $this->a = $this->get();
  4170. 4170                                         } elseif (ord($this->a) <= self::ORD_LF) {
  4171. 4171                                             throw new JSMinException('Unterminated regular expression set in regex literal.');
  4172. 4172                                         }
  4173. 4173                                     }
  4174. 4174                                 } elseif ($this->a === '/') {
  4175. 4175                                     break;
  4176. 4176                                 } elseif ($this->a === '\\') {
  4177. 4177                                     $this->output .= $this->a;
  4178. 4178                                     $this->a = $this->get();
  4179. 4179                                 } elseif (ord($this->a) <= self::ORD_LF) {
  4180. 4180                                     throw new JSMinException('Unterminated regular expression literal.');
  4181. 4181                                 }
  4182. 4182 
  4183. 4183                                 $this->output .= $this->a;
  4184. 4184                             }
  4185. 4185 
  4186. 4186                             $this->b = $this->next();
  4187. 4187                         }
  4188. 4188                 }
  4189. 4189             }
  4190. 4190 
  4191. 4191             /**
  4192. 4192              * Get next char. Convert ctrl char to space.
  4193. 4193              *
  4194. 4194              * @return string|null
  4195. 4195              */
  4196. 4196             protected function get() {
  4197. 4197                 $c = $this->lookAhead;
  4198. 4198                 $this->lookAhead = null;
  4199. 4199 
  4200. 4200                 if ($c === null) {
  4201. 4201                     if ($this->inputIndex < $this->inputLength) {
  4202. 4202                         $c = substr($this->input, $this->inputIndex, 1);
  4203. 4203                         $this->inputIndex += 1;
  4204. 4204                     } else {
  4205. 4205                         $c = null;
  4206. 4206                     }
  4207. 4207                 }
  4208. 4208 
  4209. 4209                 if ($c === "\r") {
  4210. 4210                     return "\n";
  4211. 4211                 }
  4212. 4212 
  4213. 4213                 if ($c === null || $c === "\n" || ord($c) >= self::ORD_SPACE) {
  4214. 4214                     return $c;
  4215. 4215                 }
  4216. 4216 
  4217. 4217                 return ' ';
  4218. 4218             }
  4219. 4219 
  4220. 4220             /**
  4221. 4221              * Is $c a letter, digit, underscore, dollar sign, or non-ASCII character.
  4222. 4222              *
  4223. 4223              * @return bool
  4224. 4224              */
  4225. 4225             protected function isAlphaNum($c) {
  4226. 4226                 return ord($c) > 126 || $c === '\\' || preg_match('/^[\w\$]$/', $c) === 1;
  4227. 4227             }
  4228. 4228 
  4229. 4229             /**
  4230. 4230              * Perform minification, return result
  4231. 4231              *
  4232. 4232              * @uses action()
  4233. 4233              * @uses isAlphaNum()
  4234. 4234              * @uses get()
  4235. 4235              * @uses peek()
  4236. 4236              * @return string
  4237. 4237              */
  4238. 4238             protected function min() {
  4239. 4239                 if (0 == strncmp($this->peek(), "\xef", 1)) {
  4240. 4240                         $this->get();
  4241. 4241                         $this->get();
  4242. 4242                         $this->get();
  4243. 4243                 }
  4244. 4244 
  4245. 4245                 $this->a = "\n";
  4246. 4246                 $this->action(self::ACTION_DELETE_A_B);
  4247. 4247 
  4248. 4248                 while ($this->a !== null) {
  4249. 4249                     switch ($this->a) {
  4250. 4250                         case ' ':
  4251. 4251                             if ($this->isAlphaNum($this->b)) {
  4252. 4252                                 $this->action(self::ACTION_KEEP_A);
  4253. 4253                             } else {
  4254. 4254                                 $this->action(self::ACTION_DELETE_A);
  4255. 4255                             }
  4256. 4256                             break;
  4257. 4257 
  4258. 4258                         case "\n":
  4259. 4259                             switch ($this->b) {
  4260. 4260                                 case '{':
  4261. 4261                                 case '[':
  4262. 4262                                 case '(':
  4263. 4263                                 case '+':
  4264. 4264                                 case '-':
  4265. 4265                                 case '!':
  4266. 4266                                 case '~':
  4267. 4267                                     $this->action(self::ACTION_KEEP_A);
  4268. 4268                                     break;
  4269. 4269 
  4270. 4270                                 case ' ':
  4271. 4271                                     $this->action(self::ACTION_DELETE_A_B);
  4272. 4272                                     break;
  4273. 4273 
  4274. 4274                                 default:
  4275. 4275                                     if ($this->isAlphaNum($this->b)) {
  4276. 4276                                         $this->action(self::ACTION_KEEP_A);
  4277. 4277                                     }
  4278. 4278                                     else {
  4279. 4279                                         $this->action(self::ACTION_DELETE_A);
  4280. 4280                                     }
  4281. 4281                             }
  4282. 4282                             break;
  4283. 4283 
  4284. 4284                         default:
  4285. 4285                             switch ($this->b) {
  4286. 4286                                 case ' ':
  4287. 4287                                     if ($this->isAlphaNum($this->a)) {
  4288. 4288                                         $this->action(self::ACTION_KEEP_A);
  4289. 4289                                         break;
  4290. 4290                                     }
  4291. 4291 
  4292. 4292                                     $this->action(self::ACTION_DELETE_A_B);
  4293. 4293                                     break;
  4294. 4294 
  4295. 4295                                 case "\n":
  4296. 4296                                     switch ($this->a) {
  4297. 4297                                         case '}':
  4298. 4298                                         case ']':
  4299. 4299                                         case ')':
  4300. 4300                                         case '+':
  4301. 4301                                         case '-':
  4302. 4302                                         case '"':
  4303. 4303                                         case "'":
  4304. 4304                                             $this->action(self::ACTION_KEEP_A);
  4305. 4305                                             break;
  4306. 4306 
  4307. 4307                                         default:
  4308. 4308                                             if ($this->isAlphaNum($this->a)) {
  4309. 4309                                                 $this->action(self::ACTION_KEEP_A);
  4310. 4310                                             }
  4311. 4311                                             else {
  4312. 4312                                                 $this->action(self::ACTION_DELETE_A_B);
  4313. 4313                                             }
  4314. 4314                                     }
  4315. 4315                                     break;
  4316. 4316 
  4317. 4317                                 default:
  4318. 4318                                     $this->action(self::ACTION_KEEP_A);
  4319. 4319                                     break;
  4320. 4320                             }
  4321. 4321                     }
  4322. 4322                 }
  4323. 4323 
  4324. 4324                 return $this->output;
  4325. 4325             }
  4326. 4326 
  4327. 4327             /**
  4328. 4328              * Get the next character, skipping over comments. peek() is used to see
  4329. 4329              * if a '/' is followed by a '/' or '*'.
  4330. 4330              *
  4331. 4331              * @uses get()
  4332. 4332              * @uses peek()
  4333. 4333              * @throws JSMinException On unterminated comment.
  4334. 4334              * @return string
  4335. 4335              */
  4336. 4336             protected function next() {
  4337. 4337                 $c = $this->get();
  4338. 4338 
  4339. 4339                 if ($c === '/') {
  4340. 4340                     switch($this->peek()) {
  4341. 4341                         case '/':
  4342. 4342                             for (;;) {
  4343. 4343                                 $c = $this->get();
  4344. 4344 
  4345. 4345                                 if (ord($c) <= self::ORD_LF) {
  4346. 4346                                     return $c;
  4347. 4347                                 }
  4348. 4348                             }
  4349. 4349 
  4350. 4350                         case '*':
  4351. 4351                             $this->get();
  4352. 4352 
  4353. 4353                             for (;;) {
  4354. 4354                                 switch($this->get()) {
  4355. 4355                                     case '*':
  4356. 4356                                         if ($this->peek() === '/') {
  4357. 4357                                             $this->get();
  4358. 4358                                             return ' ';
  4359. 4359                                         }
  4360. 4360                                         break;
  4361. 4361 
  4362. 4362                                     case null:
  4363. 4363                                         throw new JSMinException('Unterminated comment.');
  4364. 4364                                 }
  4365. 4365                             }
  4366. 4366 
  4367. 4367                         default:
  4368. 4368                             return $c;
  4369. 4369                     }
  4370. 4370                 }
  4371. 4371 
  4372. 4372                 return $c;
  4373. 4373             }
  4374. 4374 
  4375. 4375             /**
  4376. 4376              * Get next char. If is ctrl character, translate to a space or newline.
  4377. 4377              *
  4378. 4378              * @uses get()
  4379. 4379              * @return string|null
  4380. 4380              */
  4381. 4381             protected function peek() {
  4382. 4382                 $this->lookAhead = $this->get();
  4383. 4383                 return $this->lookAhead;
  4384. 4384             }
  4385. 4385         }
  4386. 4386 
  4387. 4387         // -- Exceptions ---------------------------------------------------------------
  4388. 4388         class JSMinException extends Exception {}
  4389. 4389 
  4390. 4390         if (
  4391. 4391                 $_php_error_is_ini_enabled &&
  4392. 4392                 $_php_error_global_handler === null &&
  4393. 4393                 @get_cfg_var('php_error.autorun')
  4394. 4394         ) {
  4395. 4395             reportErrors();
  4396. 4396         }
  4397. 4397     }
